{"ast":null,"code":"import { AsyncAction } from './AsyncAction';\nimport { Subscription } from '../Subscription';\nimport { AsyncScheduler } from './AsyncScheduler';\nexport class VirtualTimeScheduler extends AsyncScheduler {\n  constructor(schedulerActionCtor = VirtualAction, maxFrames = Infinity) {\n    super(schedulerActionCtor, () => this.frame);\n    this.maxFrames = maxFrames;\n    this.frame = 0;\n    this.index = -1;\n  }\n  flush() {\n    const {\n      actions,\n      maxFrames\n    } = this;\n    let error;\n    let action;\n    while ((action = actions[0]) && action.delay <= maxFrames) {\n      actions.shift();\n      this.frame = action.delay;\n      if (error = action.execute(action.state, action.delay)) {\n        break;\n      }\n    }\n    if (error) {\n      while (action = actions.shift()) {\n        action.unsubscribe();\n      }\n      throw error;\n    }\n  }\n}\nVirtualTimeScheduler.frameTimeFactor = 10;\nexport class VirtualAction extends AsyncAction {\n this.active = false;\n      const action = new VirtualAction(this.scheduler, this.work);\n      this.add(action);\n      return action.schedule(state, delay);\n    } else {\n      return Subscription.EMPTY;\n    }\n  }\n  requestAsyncId(scheduler, id, delay = 0) {\n    this.delay = scheduler.frame + delay;\n    const {\n      actions\n    } = scheduler;\n    actions.push(this);\n    actions.sort(VirtualAction.sortActions);\n    return 1;\n  }\n  recycleAsyncId(scheduler, id, delay = 0) {\n    return undefined;\n  }\n  _execute(state, delay) {\n    if (this.active === true) {\n b.index) {\n        return 1;\n      } else {\n        return -1;\n      }\n    } else if (a.delay > b.delay) {\n      return 1;\n    } else {\n      return -1;\n    }\n from '../Subscription';\nimport { AsyncScheduler } from './AsyncScheduler';\nexport class VirtualTimeScheduler extends AsyncScheduler {\n    constructor(schedulerActionCtor = VirtualAction, maxFrames = Infinity) {\n        super(schedulerActionCtor, () => this.frame);\n        this.maxFrames = maxFrames;\n        this.frame = 0;\n        this.index = -1;\n    }\n    flush() {\n        const { actions, maxFrames } = this;\n        let error;\n        let action;\n        while ((action = actions[0]) && action.delay <= maxFrames) {\n            actions.shift();\n            this.frame = action.delay;\n            if ((error = action.execute(action.state, action.delay))) {\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (error) {\n            while ((action = actions.shift())) {\n                action.unsubscribe();\n            }\n            throw error;\n        }\n    }\n}\nVirtualTimeScheduler.frameTimeFactor = 10;\nexport class VirtualAction extends AsyncAction {\n    constructor(scheduler, work, index = (scheduler.index += 1)) {\n        super(scheduler, work);\n        this.scheduler = scheduler;\n        this.work = work;\n        this.index = index;\n        this.active = true;\n        this.index = scheduler.index = index;\n    }\n    schedule(state, delay = 0) {\n        if (Number.isFinite(delay)) {\n            if (!this.id) {\n b.index) {\n                return 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                return -1;\n            }\n        }\n        else if (a.delay > b.delay) {\n            return 1;\n {\n  if (rf & 1) {\n    i0.ɵɵelementStart(0, \"div\", 36);\n    i0.ɵɵelement(1, \"span\", 37);\n    i0.ɵɵelementEnd();\n  }\n}\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    // Password optional for admin create/edit. If provided, must be >= 6 chars.\n    const passwordValidators = [Validators.minLength(6)];\n    const confirmValidators = []; // handled dynamically when password provided\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      status: ['', Validators.required],\n      // include password controls even if template doesn't show them yet\n      password: ['', passwordValidators],\n      confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\n    }, {\n      validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\n    });\n    // dynamically require confirmPassword if password is provided\n    this.passwordSub = this.form.get('password').valueChanges.subscribe(() => this.ensureConfirmRequiredIfPassword());\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          if (!account) {\n            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\n            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n            return;\n          }\n          // patch safe fields (do not set password fields)\n          const {\n            password,\n            confirmPassword,\n            ...safe\n          } = account;\n          this.form.patchValue(safe);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: error => {\n          this.alertService.error(error);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  ngOnDestroy() {\n    if (this.passwordSub) this.passwordSub.unsubscribe();\n  }\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields in template\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    // Prepare payload and remove password keys if blank (so backend treats them as \"not provided\")\n    const payload = {\n      ...this.form.value\n    };\n    if (!payload.password) {\n      delete payload.password;\n      delete payload.confirmPassword;\n    } else {\n      // if password provided, send only passwordHash-handling is done server-side, so remove confirmPassword\n      delete payload.confirmPassword;\n    }\n    let request$;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id, payload);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      request$ = this.accountService.create(payload);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    request$.pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n      },\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n  /**\r\n   * Cross-field validator that checks two controls match.\r\n   * Allows both fields to be empty (we permit blank password for admin-created accounts).\r\n   */\n  mustMatch(controlName, matchingControlName) {\n    return formGroup => {\n      const group = formGroup;\n      const control = group.controls[controlName];\n      const matchingControl = group.controls[matchingControlName];\n      if (!control || !matchingControl) {\n        return null;\n      }\n      // If both empty -> valid (we allow blank password)\n      if (!control.value && !matchingControl.value) {\n        // clear any mustMatch error that might be present\n        if (matchingControl.errors && matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\n          const errors = {\n            ...matchingControl.errors\n          };\n          delete errors['mustMatch'];\n          matchingControl.setErrors(Object.keys(errors).length ? errors : null);\n        }\n        return null;\n      }\n      // don't overwrite other errors on matchingControl\n      if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\n        return null;\n      }\n      // set or clear mustMatch error\n      if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\n        matchingControl.setErrors({\n          ...matchingControl.errors,\n          mustMatch: true\n        });\n      } else {\n        if (matchingControl.errors) {\n          const errors = {\n            ...matchingControl.errors\n          };\n          delete errors['mustMatch'];\n          matchingControl.setErrors(Object.keys(errors).length ? errors : null);\n        } else {\n          matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n        }\n      }\n      return null;\n    };\n  }\n  /**\r\n   * Returns true when a password has been entered (non-empty).\r\n   * Used by template to decide whether to show confirm-password and its required error.\r\n   */\n  isPasswordProvided() {\n    const pw = this.form?.get('password')?.value;\n    return !!pw && pw.toString().trim().length > 0;\n  }\n  /**\r\n   * Toggle confirmPassword required validator depending on whether password is present.\r\n   */\n  ensureConfirmRequiredIfPassword() {\n    const confirm = this.form.get('confirmPassword');\n    if (this.isPasswordProvided()) {\n      confirm.setValidators([Validators.required]);\n    } else {\n      confirm.clearValidators();\n    }\n    confirm.updateValueAndValidity({\n      onlySelf: true,\n      emitEvent: false\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function Destroy","unsubscribe","f","controls","onSubmit","submitted","clear","invalid","submitting","payload","value","request$","message","update","create","success","keepAfterRouteChange","controlName","matchingControlName","formGroup","control","matchingControl","errors","setErrors","Object","keys","length","isPasswordProvided","pw","toString","trim","confirm","setValidators","clearValidators","updateValueAndValidity","onlySelf","emitEvent","selectors","decls","vars","consts","template"],"sourceRoot":"","sources":["C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.ts","C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.html"],"sourcesContent":["// src/app/admin/accounts/add-edit.component.ts\r\nimport { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core';\r\nimport { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators, AbstractControl, ValidatorFn, ValidationErrors } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { Subscription, firstValueFrom } from 'rxjs';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy {\r\n  form!: FormGroup;\r\n  id?: string;\r\n  title!: string;\r\n  loading = false;\r\n  submitting = false;\r\n  submitted = false;\r\n\r\n  private passwordSub?: Subscription;\r\n\r\n  constructor(\r\n    private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n    private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n    private router: Router,\r\n    private accountService: AccountService,\r\n    private alertService: AlertService\r\n  ) {}\r\n\r\n  ngOnInit() {\r\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n    // Password optional for admin create/edit. If provided, must be >= 6 chars.\r\n    const passwordValidators = [Validators.minLength(6)];\r\n    const confirmValidators: any[] = []; // handled dynamically when password provided\r\n\r\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      status: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      // include password controls even if template doesn't show them yet\r\n      password: ['', passwordValidators],\r\n      confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\r\n    }, { validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword') });\r\n\r\n    // dynamically require confirmPassword if password is provided\r\n    this.passwordSub = this.form.get('password')!.valueChanges\r\n      .subscribe(() => this.ensureConfirmRequiredIfPassword());\r\n\r\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n    if (this.id) {\r\n      this.loading = true;\r\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n        .pipe(first())\r\n        .subscribe({\r\n          next: account => {\r\n            if (!account) {\r\n              this.alertService.error('Account not found');\r\n              this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n              return;\r\n            }\r\n            // patch safe fields (do not set password fields)\r\n            const { password, confirmPassword, ...safe } = account as any;\r\n            this.form.patchValue(safe);\r\n            this.loading = false;\r\n          },\r\n          error: error => {\r\n            this.alertService.error(error);\r\n            this.loading = false;\r\n          }\r\n        });\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  ngOnDestroy() {\r\n    if (this.passwordSub) this.passwordSub.unsubscribe();\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields in template\r\n  get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n  onSubmit() {\r\n    this.submitted = true;\r\n    this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n    this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n    // Prepare payload and remove password keys if blank (so backend treats them as \"not provided\")\r\n    const payload: any = { ...this.form.value };\r\n\r\n    if (!payload.password) {\r\n      delete payload.password;\r\n      delete payload.confirmPassword;\r\n    } else {\r\n      // if password provided, send only passwordHash-handling is done server-side, so remove confirmPassword\r\n      delete payload.confirmPassword;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    let request$;\r\n    let message: string;\r\n\r\n    if (this.id) {\r\n      request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id!, payload);\r\n      message = 'Account updated';\r\n    } else {\r\n      request$ = this.accountService.create(payload);\r\n      message = 'Account created';\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    request$\r\n      .pipe(first())\r\n      .subscribe({\r\n        next: () => {\r\n          this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n          this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n        },\r\n        error: error => {\r\n          this.alertService.error(error);\r\n          this.submitting = false;\r\n        }\r\n      });\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  /**\r\n   * Cross-field validator that checks two controls match.\r\n   * Allows both fields to be empty (we permit blank password for admin-created accounts).\r\n   */\r\n  mustMatch(controlName: string, matchingControlName: string): ValidatorFn {\r\n    return (formGroup: AbstractControl): ValidationErrors | null => {\r\n      const group = formGroup as FormGroup;\r\n      const control = group.controls[controlName];\r\n      const matchingControl = group.controls[matchingControlName];\r\n\r\n      if (!control || !matchingControl) {\r\n        return null;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      // If both empty -> valid (we allow blank password)\r\n      if (!control.value && !matchingControl.value) {\r\n        // clear any mustMatch error that might be present\r\n        if (matchingControl.errors && matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\r\n          const errors = { ...matchingControl.errors };\r\n          delete errors['mustMatch'];\r\n          matchingControl.setErrors(Object.keys(errors).length ? errors : null);\r\n        }\r\n        return null;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      // don't overwrite other errors on matchingControl\r\n      if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\r\n        return null;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      // set or clear mustMatch error\r\n      if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\r\n        matchingControl.setErrors({ ...matchingControl.errors, mustMatch: true });\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (matchingControl.errors) {\r\n          const errors = { ...matchingControl.errors };\r\n          delete errors['mustMatch'];\r\n          matchingControl.setErrors(Object.keys(errors).length ? errors : null);\r\n        } else {\r\n          matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      return null;\r\n    };\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  /**\r\n   * Returns true when a password has been entered (non-empty).\r\n   * Used by template to decide whether to show confirm-password and its required error.\r\n   */\r\n  isPasswordProvided(): boolean {\r\n    const pw = this.form?.get('password')?.value;\r\n    return !!pw && pw.toString().trim().length > 0;\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  /**\r\n   * Toggle confirmPassword required validator depending on whether password is present.\r\n   */\r\n  ensureConfirmRequiredIfPassword() {\r\n    const confirm = this.form.get('confirmPassword')!;\r\n    if (this.isPasswordProvided()) {\r\n      confirm.setValidators([Validators.required]);\r\n    } else {\r\n      confirm.clearValidators();\r\n    }\r\n    confirm.updateValueAndValidity({ onlySelf: true, emitEvent: false });\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n  <div class=\"row\">\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Title</label>\r\n      <select formControlName=\"title\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.title.errors }\">\r\n        <option value=\"\">-- Select --</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mr\">Mr</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mrs\">Mrs</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Miss\">Miss</option>\r\n      </select>\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.title.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Title is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">First Name</label>\r\n      <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"firstName\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ {"ast":null,"code":"// custom validator to check that two fields match\nexport function MustMatch(controlName, matchingControlName) {\n  return group => {\n    const control = group.get(controlName);\n    const matchingControl = group.get(matchingControlName);\n    if (!control || !matchingControl) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    // return if another validator has already found an error on the matchingControl\n    if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors.mustMatch) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    // set error on matchingControl if validation fails\n };\n}","map":{"version":3,"mappings":"AAEA;AACA,OAAM,SAAUA,SAAS,CAACC,WAAmB,EAAEC,mBAA2B;EACtE,OAAQC,KAAsB,IAAI;IAC9B,MAAMC,OAAO,GAAGD,KAAK,CAACE,GAAG,CAACJ,WAAW,CAAC;IACtC,MAAMK,eAAe,GAAGH,KAAK,CAACE,GAAG,CAACH,mBAAmB,CAAC;IAEtD,IAAI,CAACE,OAAO,IAAI,CAACE,eAAe,EAAE;MAC9B,OAAO,IAAI;;IAGf;IACA,IAAIA,eAAe,CAACC,MAAM,IAAI,CAACD,eAAe,CAACC,MAAM,CAACC,SAAS,EAAE;MAC7D,OAAO,IAAI;;IAGf;IACA,IAAIJ,OAAO,CAACK,KAAK,KAAKH,eAAe,CAACG,KAAK,EAAE;MACzCH,eAAe,CAACI,SAAS,CAAC;QAAEF,SAAS,EAAE;MAAI,CAAE,CAAC;KACjD,MAAM;MACHF,eAAe,CAACI,SAAS,CAAC,IAAI,CAAC;;IAEnC,OAAO,IAAI;EACf,CAAC;AACL","names":["MustMatch","controlName","matchingControlName","group","control","get","matchingControl","errors","mustMatch","value","setErrors"],"sourceRoot":"","sources":["C:\\Users\\Kenith const matchingControl = group.get(matchingControlName);\r\n\r\n        if (!control || !matchingControl) {\r\n            return null;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // return if another validator has matchingControl if validation fails\r\n        if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\r\n            matchingControl.setErrors({ mustMatch: true });\r\n        } else {\r\n {"ast":null,"code":"import { map } from './map';\nimport { innerFrom } from '../observable/innerFrom';\nimport { operate } from '../util/lift';\nimport { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nexport function exhaustMap(project, resultSelector) {\n  if (resultSelector) {\n    return source => source.pipe(exhaustMap((a, i) => innerFrom(project(a, i)).pipe(map((b, ii) => resultSelector(a, b, i, ii)))));\n  }\n  return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n    let index = 0;\n    let innerSub = null;\n    let isComplete = false;\n    source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, outerValue => {\n      if (!innerSub) {\n        innerSub = createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, undefined, () => {\n          innerSub = null;\n          isComplete && subscriber.complete();\n        });\n        innerFrom(project(outerValue, index++)).subscribe(innerSub);\n      }\n    }, () => {\n      isComplete = true;\n      !innerSub && subscriber.complete();\n    }));\n  });\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["map","innerFrom","operate","createOperatorSubscriber","exhaustMap","project","resultSelector","source","pipe","a","i","b","ii","subscriber","index","innerSub","isComplete","subscribe","outerValue","undefined","complete"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith '../observable/innerFrom';\nimport { operate } from '../util/lift';\nimport { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nexport function exhaustMap(project, resultSelector) {\n    if (resultSelector) {\n        return (source) => source.pipe(exhaustMap((a, i) => innerFrom(project(a, i)).pipe(map((b, ii) => resultSelector(a, b, i, ii)))));\n    }\n    return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n        let index = 0;\n        let innerSub = null;\n        let isComplete = false;\n        source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, (outerValue) => {\n            if (!innerSub) {\n                innerSub = createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, undefined, () => {\n                    innerSub = null;\n                    isComplete && subscriber.complete();\n  i0.ɵɵelementStart(0, \"div\", 35);\n    i0.ɵɵelement(1, \"span\", 36);\n    i0.ɵɵelementEnd();\n  }\n}\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n    // show/hide toggles\n    this.showPassword = false;\n    this.showConfirmPassword = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    // password validators: required when creating, optional when editing\n    const passwordValidators = this.id ? [Validators.minLength(8)] : [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8)];\n    const confirmValidators = this.id ? [] : [Validators.required];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      status: ['', Validators.required],\n      password: ['', passwordValidators],\n      confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\n    }, {\n      validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\n    });\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          if (!account) {\n            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\n            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n            return;\n          }\n          // patch values (do not patch password fields)\n          const {\n            password,\n            confirmPassword,\n            ...rest\n          } = account;\n          this.form.patchValue(rest);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: error => {\n          this.alertService.error(error);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // shortcut for easy access to form fields in template\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  // validator: ensures password and confirmPassword match (only triggers when appropriate)\n  mustMatch(controlName, matchingControlName) {\n    return formGroup => {\n      const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\n      const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\n      if (!control || !matchingControl) return;\n      // don't overwrite other errors on matchingControl\n      if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors.mustMatch) {\n        return;\n      }\n      // if either has a value, require them to match\n      if ((control.value || matchingControl.value) && control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\n        matchingControl.setErrors({\n          mustMatch: true\n        });\n      } else {\n        // if both empty or match, clear mustMatch error\n        if (matchingControl.errors) {\n          // if the only error is mustMatch, clear it; otherwise keep other errors\n          const e = matchingControl.errors;\n          if (Object.keys(e).length === 1 && e.mustMatch) {\n            matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n          } else if (!e.mustMatch) {\n            // keep other errors (e.g. required) intact\n          } else {\n            // remove mustMatch while preserving others (rare)\n            delete e.mustMatch;\n            if (Object.keys(e).length === 0) matchingControl.setErrors(null);else matchingControl.setErrors(e);\n          }\n        } else {\n          matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n        }\n      }\n    };\n  }\n  togglePassword() {\n    this.showPassword = !this.showPassword;\n  }\n  toggleConfirmPassword() {\n    this.showConfirmPassword = !this.showConfirmPassword;\n  }\n  cancel() {\n    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    // stop if form invalid\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    // prepare payload: remove confirmPassword, and if password is blank remove it too\n    const payload = {\n      ...this.form.value\n    };\n    delete payload.confirmPassword;\n    if (!payload.password || payload.password.trim() === '') {\n      delete payload.password;\n    }\n    let request$;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id, payload);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      request$ = this.accountService.create(payload);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    request$.pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n      },\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || AddEditComponent)(i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i1.FormBuilder), AI,CAAC;;;IAG3C,CAAC;EACL;EAEAK,cAAc;IACV,IAAI,CAACC,YAAY,GAAG,CAAC,IAAI,CAACA,YAAY;EAC1C;EAEAC,qBAAqB;IACjB,IAAI,CAACC,mBAAmB,GAAG,CAAC,IAAI,CAACA,mBAAmB;EACxD;EAEAC,MAAM;IACF,IAAI,CAACnD,MAAM,CAAC8B,QAAQ,CAAC,CAAC,iBAAiB,CAAC,CAAC;EAC7C;EAEAsB,QAAQ;IACJ,IAAI,CAACC,SAAS,GAAG,IAAI;IACrB,IAAI,CAACnD,YAAY,CAACoD,KAAK,EAAE;IAEzB;IACA,IAAI,IAAI,CAAC3C,IAAI,CAAC4C,OAAO,EAAE;IAEvB,IAAI,CAACC,UAAU,GAAG,IAAI;IAEtB;IACA,MAAMC,OAAO,GAAQ;MAAE,GAAG,IAAI,CAAC9C,IAAI,CAAC8B;IAAK,CAAE;IAC3C,OAAOgB,OAAO,CAACrC,eAAe;IAC9B,IAAI,CAACqC,OAAO,CAACtC,QAAQ,IAAIsC,OAAO,CAACtC,QAAQ,CAACuC,IAAI,EAAE,KAAK,EAAE,EAAE;MACrD,OAAOD,OAAO,CAACtC,QAAQ;;IAG3B,IAAIwC,QAAQ;IACZ,IAAIC,OAAe;IAEnB,IAAI,IAAI,CAACxD,EAAE,EAAE;MACTuD,QAAQ,GAAG,IAAI,CAAC1D,cAAc,CAAC4D,MAAM,CAAC,IAAI,CAACzD,EAAG,EAAEqD,OAAO,CAAC;MACxDG,OAAO,GAAG,iBAAiB;KAC9B,MAAM;MACHD,QAAQ,GAAG,IAAI,CAAC1D,cAAc,CAAC6D,MAAM,CAACL,OAAO,CAAC;MAC9CG,OAAO,GAAG,iBAAiB;;IAG/BD,QAAQ,CACHlC,IAAI,CAAC/B,KAAK,EAAE,CAAC,CACbgC,SAAS,CAAC;MACPC,IAAI,EAAE,MAAK;QACP,IAAI,CAACzB,YAAY,CAAC6D,OAAO,CAACH,OAAO,EAAE;UAAEI,oBAAoB,EAAE;QAAI,CAAE,CAAC;QAClE,IAAI,CAAChE,MAAM,CAAC8B,QAAQ,CAAC,CAAC,iBAAiB,CAAC,CAAC;MAC7C,CAAC;MACDD,KAAK,EAAEA,KAAK,IAAG;QACX,IAAI,CAAC3B,YAAY,CAAC2B,KAAK,CAACA,KAAK,CAAC;QAC9B,IAAI,CAAC2B,UAAU,GAAG,KAAK;MAC3B;KACH,CAAC;EACV;;;mBA7JS5D,gBAAgB;AAAA;;QAAhBA,gBAAgB;EAAAqE;EAAAC;EAAAC;EAAAC;EAAAC;IAAA;MCR7B1E,0BAAI;MAAAA,YAAW;MAAAA,iBAAK;MACpBA,qEAwGO;MAEPA,iEAEM;;;MA7GFA,eAAW;MAAXA,+BAAW;MACRA,eAAc;MAAdA,mCAAc;MA0GfA,eAAa;MAAbA,kCAAa","names":["Validators","first","i0","AddEditComponent","constructor","formBuilder","route","router","accountService","alertService","ngOnInit","id","snapshot","params","passwordValidators","minLength","required","confirmValidators","form","group","title","firstName","lastName","email","role","status","password","confirmPassword","validators","mustMatch","loading","getById","pipe","subscribe","next","account","error","navigate","rest","patchValue","f","controls","controlName","matchingControlName","formGroup","control","matchingControl","errors","value","setErrors","e","Object","keys","length","togglePassword","showPassword","toggleConfirmPassword","showConfirmPassword","cancel","onSubmit","submitted","clear","invalid","submitting","payload","trim","request$","message","update","create","success","keepAfterRouteChange","selectors","decls","vars","consts","template"],"sourceRoot":"","sources":["C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.ts","C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.html"],"sourcesContent":["import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';\r\nimport { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n    // show/hide toggles\r\n    showPassword = false;\r\n    showConfirmPassword = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) {}\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n        this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n        // password validators: required when creating, optional when editing\r\n        const passwordValidators = this.id ? [Validators.minLength(8)] : [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8)];\r\n        const confirmValidators = this.id ? [] : [Validators.required];\r\n\r\n        this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n            title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n            role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            status: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            password: ['', passwordValidators],\r\n            confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\r\n        }, {\r\n            validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\r\n        });\r\n\r\n        this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe({\r\n                    next: account => {\r\n                        if (!account) {\r\n                            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\r\n                            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n                            return;\r\n                        }\r\n                        // patch values (do not patch password fields)\r\n                        const { password, confirmPassword, ...rest } = account as any;\r\n                        this.form.patchValue(rest);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    },\r\n                    error: error => {\r\n                        this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // shortcut for easy access to form fields in template\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    // validator: ensures password and confirmPassword match (only triggers when appropriate)\r\n    private mustMatch(controlName: string, matchingControlName: string) {\r\n        return (formGroup: FormGroup) => {\r\n            const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\r\n            const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\r\n\r\n            if (!control || !matchingControl) return;\r\n\r\n            // don't overwrite other errors on matchingControl\r\n            if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors.mustMatch) {\r\n                return;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            // if either has a value, require them to match\r\n            if ((control.value || matchingControl.value) && control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\r\n                matchingControl.setErrors({ mustMatch: true });\r\n            } else {\r\n                // if both empty or match, clear mustMatch error\r\n                if (matchingControl.errors) {\r\n                    // if the only error is mustMatch, clear it; otherwise keep other errors\r\n                    const e = matchingControl.errors;\r\n                    if (Object.keys(e).length === 1 && e.mustMatch) {\r\n                        matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n                    } else if (!e.mustMatch) {\r\n                        // keep other errors (e.g. required) intact\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        // remove mustMatch while preserving others (rare)\r\n                        delete e.mustMatch;\r\n                        if (Object.keys(e).length === 0) matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n                        else matchingControl.setErrors(e);\r\n                    }\r\n                } else {\r\n                    matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        };\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    togglePassword() {\r\n        this.showPassword = !this.showPassword;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    toggleConfirmPassword() {\r\n        this.showConfirmPassword = !this.showConfirmPassword;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    cancel() {\r\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        // stop if form invalid\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        // prepare payload: remove confirmPassword, and if password is blank remove it too\r\n        const payload: any = { ...this.form.value };\r\n        delete payload.confirmPassword;\r\n        if (!payload.password || payload.password.trim() === '') {\r\n            delete payload.password;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        let request$;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id!, payload);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            request$ = this.accountService.create(payload);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        request$\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n  <div class=\"row\">\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Title</label>\r\n      <select formControlName=\"title\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.title.errors }\">\r\n        <option value=\"\">-- Select --</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mr\">Mr</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mrs\">Mrs</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Miss\">Miss</option>\r\n      </select>\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.title.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Title is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">First Name</label>\r\n      <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"firstName\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.firstName.errors }\" />\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.firstName.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">First Name is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Last Name</label>\r\n      <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"lastName\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.lastName.errors }\" />\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.lastName.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Last Name is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n  </div>\r\n\r\n  <div class=\"mb-3\">\r\n    <label class=\"form-label\">Email</label>\r\n    <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"email\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.email.errors }\" />\r\n    <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.email.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Valid Email /(?:(?:\\u001b\\[)|\\u009b)(?:(?:[0-9]{1,3})?(?:(?:;[0-9]{0,3})*)?[A-M|f-m])|\\u001b[A-M]/;\nvar _defColors = {\n  reset: ['fff', '000'],\n  // [FOREGROUD_COLOR, BACKGROUND_COLOR]\n  black: '000',\n  red: 'ff0000',\n  green: '209805',\n  yellow: 'e8bf03',\n  blue: '0000ff',\n  magenta: 'ff00ff',\n  cyan: '00ffee',\n  lightgrey: 'f0f0f0',\n  darkgrey: '888'\n};\nvar _styles = {\n  30: 'black',\n  31: 'red',\n  32: 'green',\n  33: 'yellow',\n  34: 'blue',\n  35: 'magenta',\n  36: 'cyan',\n  37: 'lightgrey'\n};\nvar _openTags = {\n  '1': 'font-weight:bold',\n  // bold\n  '2': 'opacity:0.5',\n  // dim\n  '3': '<i>',\n  // italic\n  '4': '<u>',\n  // underscore\n  '8': 'display:none',\n  // hidden\n  '9': '<del>' // delete\n};\n\nvar _closeTags = {\n  '23': '</i>',\n  // reset italic\n  '24': '</u>',\n  // reset underscore\n  '29': '</del>' // reset delete\n};\n\n[0, 21, 22, 27, 28, 39, 49].forEach(function (n) {\n  _closeTags[n] = '</span>';\n});\n\n/**\n * Converts text with ANSI color codes to HTML markup.\n * @param {String} text\n * @returns {*}\n */\nfunction ansiHTML(text) {\n  // Returns the text if the string has no ANSI escape code.\n  if (!_regANSI.test(text)) {\n    return text;\n  }\n\n  // Cache opened sequence.\n  var ansiCodes = [];\n  // Replace with markup.\n  var ret = text.replace(/\\033\\[(\\d+)m/g, function (match, seq) {\n    var ot = _openTags[seq];\n    if (ot) {\n      // If current sequence has been opened, close it.\n      if (!!~ansiCodes.indexOf(seq)) {\n        // eslint-disable-line no-extra-boolean-cast\n        ansiCodes.pop();\n        return '</span>';\n      }\n      // Open tag.\n      ansiCodes.push(seq);\n      return ot[0] === '<' ? ot : '<span style=\"' + ot + ';\">';\n    }\n    var ct = _closeTags[seq];\n    if (ct) {\n      // Pop sequence\n      ansiCodes.pop();\n      return ct;\n    }\n    return '';\n  });\n\n  // Make sure tags are closed.\n  var l = ansiCodes.length;\n  l > 0 && (ret += Array(l + 1).join('</span>'));\n  return ret;\n}\n\n/**\n * Customize colors.\n * @param {Object} colors reference to _defColors\n */\nansiHTML.setColors = function (colors) {\n  if (typeof colors !== 'object') {\n    throw new Error('`colors` parameter must be an Object.');\n  }\n  var _finalColors = {};\n  for (var key in _defColors) {\n    var hex = colors.hasOwnProperty(key) ? colors[key] : null;\n    if (!hex) {\n      _finalColors[key] = _defColors[key];\n      continue;\n    }\n    if ('reset' === key) {\n      if (typeof hex === 'string') {\n        hex = [hex];\n      }\n      if (!Array.isArray(hex) || hex.length === 0 || hex.some(function (h) {\n        return typeof h !== 'string';\n      })) {\n        throw new Error('The value of `' + key + '` property must be an Array and each item could only be a hex string, e.g.: FF0000');\n      }\n      var defHexColor = _defColors[key];\n      if (!hex[0]) {\n        hex[0] = defHexColor[0];\n      }\n      if (hex.length === 1 || !hex[1]) {\n        hex = [hex[0]];\n        hex.push(defHexColor[1]);\n      }\n      hex = hex.slice(0, 2);\n    } else if (typeof hex !== 'string') {\n      throw new Error('The value of `' + key + '` property must be a hex string, e.g.: FF0000');\n    }\n    _finalColors[key] = hex;\n  }\n  _setTags(_finalColors);\n};\n\n/**\n * Reset colors.\n */\nansiHTML.reset = function () {\n  _setTags(_defColors);\n};\n\n/**\n * Expose tags, including open and close.\n * @type {Object}\n */\nansiHTML.tags = {};\nif (Object.defineProperty) {\n  Object.defineProperty(ansiHTML.tags, 'open', {\n    get: function () {\n      return _openTags;\n    }\n  });\n  Object.defineProperty(ansiHTML.tags, 'close', {\n    get: function () {\n      return _closeTags;\n    }\n  });\n} else {\n  ansiHTML.tags.open = _openTags;\n  ansiHTML.tags.close = _closeTags;\n}\nfunction _setTags(colors) {\n  // reset all\n  _openTags['0'] = 'font-weight:normal;opacity:1;color:#' + colors.reset[0] + ';background:#' + colors.reset[1];\n  // inverse\n  _openTags['7'] = 'color:#' + colors.reset[1] + ';background:#' + colors.reset[0];\n  // dark grey\n  _openTags['90'] = 'color:#' + colors.darkgrey;\n  for (var code in _styles) {\n    var color = _styles[code];\n    var oriColor = colors[color] || '000';\n    _openTags[code] = 'color:#' + oriColor;\n    code = parseInt(code);\n {"ast":null,"code":"import { BehaviorSubject } from 'rxjs';\nimport { map, finalize } from 'rxjs/operators';\nimport { environment } from '@environments/environment';\nimport * as i0 from \"@angular/core\";\nimport * as i1 from \"@angular/router\";\nimport * as i2 from \"@angular/common/http\";\nconst baseUrl = `${environment.apiUrl}/accounts`;\nexport class AccountService {\n  constructor(router, http) {\n    this.router = router;\n    this.http = http;\n    this.accountSubject = new BehaviorSubject(null);\n    this.account = this.accountSubject.asObservable();\n  }\n  get accountValue() {\n    return this.accountSubject.value;\n  }\n  login(email, password) {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/authenticate`, {\n      email,\n      password\n    }, {\n      withCredentials: true\n    }).pipe(map(account => {\n      this.accountSubject.next(account);\n      this.startRefreshTokenTimer();\n      return account;\n    }));\n  }\n  logout() {\n    this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/revoke-token`, {}, {\n      withCredentials: true\n    }).subscribe();\n    this.stopRefreshTokenTimer();\n    this.accountSubject.next(null);\n    this.router.navigate(['/account/login']);\n  }\n  refreshToken() {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/refresh-token`, {}, {\n      withCredentials: true\n    }).pipe(map(account => {\n      this.accountSubject.next(account);\n      this.startRefreshTokenTimer();\n      return account;\n    }));\n  }\n  register(account) {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/register`, account);\n  }\n  verifyEmail(token) {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/verify-email`, {\n      token\n    });\n  }\n  forgotPassword(email) {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/forgot-password`, {\n      email\n    });\n  }\n  validateResetToken(token) {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/validate-reset-token`, {\n      token\n    });\n  }\n  resetPassword(token, password, confirmPassword) {\n    return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/reset-password`, {\n      token,\n      password,\n      confirmPassword\n    });\n  }\n  getAll() {\n    return this.http.get(baseUrl);\n  }\n  getById(id) {\n    return this.http.get(`${baseUrl}/${id}`);\n  }\n  create(params) {\n    return this.http.post(baseUrl, params);\n  }\n  update(id, params) {\n    return this.http.put(`${baseUrl}/${id}`, params).pipe(map(account => {\n      // update the current account if it was updated\n      if (account.id === this.accountValue?.id) {\n        // publish updated account to subscribers\n        account = {\n          ...this.accountValue,\n          ...account\n        };\n        this.accountSubject.next(account);\n      }\n      return account;\n    }));\n  }\n  delete(id) {\n    return this.http.delete(`${baseUrl}/${id}`).pipe(finalize(() => {\n      // auto logout if the logged in account was deleted\n      if (id === this.accountValue?.id) this.logout();\n    }));\n  }\n  startRefreshTokenTimer() {\n    // parse json object from base64 encoded jwt token\n    const jwtBase64 = this.accountValue.jwtToken.split('.')[1];\n    const jwtToken = JSON.parse(atob(jwtBase64));\n    // set a timeout to refresh the token a minute before it expires\n    const expires = new Date(jwtToken.exp * 1000);\n    const timeout = expires.getTime() - Date.now() - 60 * 1000;\n    this.refreshTokenTimeout = setTimeout(() => this.refreshToken().subscribe(), timeout);\n  }\n  stopRefreshTokenTimer() {\n    clearTimeout(this.refreshTokenTimeout);\n  }\n}\nAccountService.ɵfac = function AccountService_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || AccountService)(i0.ɵɵinject(i1.Router), i0.ɵɵinject(i2.HttpClient));\n};\nAccountService.ɵprov = /*@__PURE__*/i0.ɵɵdefineInjectable({\n  token: { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http';\r\nimport { BehaviorSubject, Observable } from 'rxjs';\r\nimport { map, finalize } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { environment } from '@environments/environment';\r\nimport { Account } from '@app/_models';\r\n\r\nconst baseUrl = `${environment.apiUrl}/accounts`;\r\n\r\n@Injectable({ providedIn: 'root' })\r\nexport class AccountService {\r\n    private accountSubject: BehaviorSubject<Account | null>;\r\n    public account: Observable<Account | null>;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private http: HttpClient\r\n    ) {\r\n        this.accountSubject = new BehaviorSubject<Account | null>(null);\r\n        this.account = this.accountSubject.asObservable();\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    public get accountValue() {\r\n        return this.accountSubject.value;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    login(email: string, password: string) {\r\n        return this.http.post<any>(`${baseUrl}/authenticate`, { email, password }, { withCredentials: true })\r\n            .pipe(map(account => {\r\n                this.accountSubject.next(account);\r\n                this.startRefreshTokenTimer();\r\n                return account;\r\n            }));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    logout() {\r\n        this.http.post<any>(`${baseUrl}/revoke-token`, {}, { withCredentials: true }).subscribe();\r\n        this.stopRefreshTokenTimer();\r\n        this.accountSubject.next(null);\r\n        this.router.navigate(['/account/login']);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    refreshToken() {\r\n        return this.http.post<any>(`${baseUrl}/refresh-token`, {}, { withCredentials: true })\r\n            .pipe(map((account) => {\r\n                this.accountSubject.next(account);\r\n                this.startRefreshTokenTimer();\r\n                return account;\r\n            }));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    register(account: Account) {\r\n        return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/register`, account);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    verifyEmail(token: string) {\r\n        return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/verify-email`, { token });\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    forgotPassword(email: string) {\r\n        return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/forgot-password`, { email });\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    validateResetToken(token: string) {\r\n        return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/validate-reset-token`, { token });\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    resetPassword(token: string, password: string, confirmPassword: string) {\r\n        return this.http.post(`${baseUrl}/reset-password`, { token, password, confirmPassword });\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    getAll() {\r\n        return this.http.get<Account[]>(baseUrl);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    getById(id: string) {\r\n        return this.http.get<Account>(`${baseUrl}/${id}`);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    create(params: any) {\r\n        return this.http.post(baseUrl, params);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    update(id: string, params: any) {\r\n        return this.http.put(`${baseUrl}/${id}`, params)\r\n            .pipe(map((account: any) => {\r\n                // update the current account if it was updated\r\n                if (account.id === this.accountValue?.id) {\r\n                    // publish updated account to subscribers\r\n                    account = { ...this.accountValue, ...account };\r\n                    this.accountSubject.next(account);\r\n                }\r\n                return account;\r\n            }));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    delete(id: string) {\r\n        return this.http.delete(`${baseUrl}/${id}`)\r\n            .pipe(finalize(() => {\r\n                // auto logout if the logged in account was deleted\r\n                if (id === this.accountValue?.id)\r\n                    this.logout();\r\n            }));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // helper methods\r\n\r\n    private refreshTokenTimeout?: any;\r\n\r\n    private startRefreshTokenTimer() {\r\n        // parse json object from base64 encoded jwt token\r\n        const jwtBase64 = this.accountValue!.jwtToken!.split('.')[1];\r\n        const jwtToken = JSON.parse(atob(jwtBase64));\r\n\r\n        // set a timeout to refresh the token a minute before it expires\r\n        const expires = new Date(jwtToken.exp * 1000);\r\n        const timeout = expires.getTime() - Date.now() - (60 * 1000);\r\n        this.refreshTokenTimeout = setTimeout(() => this.refreshToken().subscribe(), timeout);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    private stopRefreshTokenTimer() {\r\n        clearTimeout(this.refreshTokenTimeout);\r\n    }\r\n}"]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

callbackFunc, resultSelector, scheduler) {\n  if (resultSelector) {\n    if (isScheduler(resultSelector)) {\n      scheduler = resultSelector;\n    } else {\n      return function (...args) {\n {"ast":null,"code":"import { Observable } from '../Observable';\nimport { async as asyncScheduler } from '../scheduler/async';\nimport { isScheduler } from '../util/isScheduler';\nimport { isValidDate } from '../util/isDate';\nexport function timer(dueTime = 0, intervalOrScheduler, scheduler = asyncScheduler) {\n  let intervalDuration = -1;\n  if (intervalOrScheduler != null) {\n    if (isScheduler(intervalOrScheduler)) {\n      scheduler = intervalOrScheduler;\n    } else {\n      intervalDuration = intervalOrScheduler;\n    }\n  }\n  return new Observable(subscriber => {\n    let due = isValidDate(dueTime) ? +dueTime - scheduler.now() : dueTime;\n    if (due < 0) {\n      due = 0;\n    }\n    let n = 0;\n    return scheduler.schedule(function () {\n      if (!subscriber.closed) {\n        subscriber.next(n++);\n        if (0 <= intervalDuration) {\n          this.schedule(undefined, intervalDuration);\n        } else {\n          subscriber.complete();\n        }\n      }\n    }, due);\n  });\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["Observable","async","asyncScheduler","isScheduler","isValidDate","timer","dueTime","intervalOrScheduler","scheduler","intervalDuration","subscriber","due","now","n","schedule","closed","next","undefined","complete"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/observable/timer.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { Observable } from '../Observable';\nimport { async as asyncScheduler } from '../scheduler/async';\nimport { isScheduler } from '../util/isScheduler';\nimport { isValidDate } from '../util/isDate';\nexport function timer(dueTime = 0, intervalOrScheduler, scheduler = asyncScheduler) {\n    let intervalDuration = -1;\n    if (intervalOrScheduler != null) {\n        if (isScheduler(intervalOrScheduler)) {\n            scheduler = intervalOrScheduler;\n        }\n        else {\n            intervalDuration = intervalOrScheduler;\n        }\n    }\n    return new Observable((subscriber) => {\n        let due = isValidDate(dueTime) ? validator: sets mustMatch error on matchingControl when values differ.\r\n * Usage: { validator: MustMatch('password','confirmPassword') }\r\n */\nexport function MustMatch(controlName, matchingControlName) {\n  return formGroup => {\n    const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\n    const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\n    if (!control || !matchingControl) return;\n    // If another validator has already found an error on the matchingControl, do nothing.\n    if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\n      return;\n    }\n    // set error on matchingControl if validation fails\n    if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\n      matchingControl.setErrors({\n        mustMatch: true\n      });\n    } else {\n      // Clear mustMatch error (keep other errors, if any)\n      if (matchingControl.errors) {\n        const {\n          mustMatch,\n          ...otherErrors\n        } = matchingControl.errors;\n        const newErrors = Object.keys(otherErrors).length ? otherErrors : null;\n        matchingControl.setErrors(newErrors);\n      } else {\n        matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n      }\n    }\n  };\n}\n// -------------------------------------------------------------------------------\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    // example: read id from route\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      // password is required only in add mode (no id)\n      password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(this.id ? [] : [Validators.required])]],\n      confirmPassword: ['']\n    }, {\n      validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\n    });\n    // If edit mode, you may want to load existing account and patch the form\n    if (this.id) {\n      // load account and patch values, and don't set password validators (user may not change password)\n      // e.g. this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe(x => this.form.patchValue(x));\n    }\n  }\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    // stop if form invalid\n    if (this.form.invalid) {\n      return;\n    }\n    this.loading = true;\n    const formValue = this.form.value;\n    // Use your AccountService to call backend\n    // If creating: ensure password exists (frontend check)\n    // Example pseudo-call:\n    // this.accountService.create(formValue).pipe(first()).subscribe(...)\n    // remember: if in edit mode and password left blank, do not send password to backend\n    if (this.id) {\n      // remove password fields if empty\n      if (!formValue.password) {\n        delete formValue.password;\n        delete formValue.confirmPassword;\n      }\n      // call update endpoint...\n    } else {\n      // create endpoint -> password required\n    }\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || AddEditComponent)(i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i1.FormBuilder), from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\n// --- Simple MustMatch validator (place here or move to a shared file and import) ---\r\n/**\r\n * Cross-field validator: sets mustMatch error on matchingControl when values differ.\r\n * Usage: { validator: MustMatch('password','confirmPassword') }\r\n */\r\nexport function MustMatch(controlName: string, matchingControlName: string) {\r\n  return (formGroup: FormGroup) => {\r\n    const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\r\n    const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\r\n\r\n    if (!control || !matchingControl) return;\r\n\r\n    // If another validator has already found an error on the matchingControl, do nothing.\r\n    if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\r\n      return;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // set error on matchingControl if validation fails\r\n    if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\r\n      matchingControl.setErrors({ mustMatch: true });\r\n    } else {\r\n      // Clear mustMatch error (keep other errors, if any)\r\n      if (matchingControl.errors) {\r\n        const { mustMatch, ...otherErrors } = matchingControl.errors;\r\n        const newErrors = Object.keys(otherErrors).length ? otherErrors : null;\r\n        matchingControl.setErrors(newErrors);\r\n      } else {\r\n        matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n}\r\n// -------------------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n    private router: Router,\r\n    // inject your services: AccountService, AlertService, etc.\r\n  ) { }\r\n\r\n  ngOnInit() {\r\n    // example: read id from route\r\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      // password is required only in add mode (no id)\r\n      password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(this.id ? [] : [Validators.required])]],\r\n      confirmPassword: ['']\r\n    }, {\r\n      validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\r\n    });\r\n\r\n    // If edit mode, you may want to load existing account and patch the form\r\n    if (this.id) {\r\n      // load account and patch values, and don't set password validators (user may not change password)\r\n      // e.g. this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe(x => this.form.patchValue(x));\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\r\n  get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n  onSubmit() {\r\n    this.submitted = true;\r\n\r\n    // stop if form invalid\r\n    if (this.form.invalid) {\r\n      return;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    this.loading = true;\r\n    const formValue = this.form.value;\r\n\r\n    // Use your AccountService to call backend\r\n    // If creating: ensure password exists (frontend check)\r\n    // Example pseudo-call:\r\n    // this.accountService.create(formValue).pipe(first()).subscribe(...)\r\n\r\n    // remember: if in edit mode and password left blank, do not send password to backend\r\n    if (this.id) {\r\n      // remove password fields if empty\r\n      if (!formValue.password) {\r\n        delete formValue.password;\r\n        delete formValue.confirmPassword;\r\n      }\r\n      // call update endpoint...\r\n    } else {\r\n      // create endpoint -> password required\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n  <div class=\"row\">\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Title</label>\r\n      <select formControlName=\"title\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.title.errors }\">\r\n        <option value=\"\">-- Select --</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mr\">Mr</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mrs\">Mrs</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Miss\">Miss</option>\r\n      </select>\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.title.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Title is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">First Name</label>\r\n      <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"firstName\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'object') {\n    config = configOrCount;\n  } else {\n    config = {\n      count: configOrCount\n    };\n  }\n  const {\n    count = Infinity,\n    delay,\n    resetOnSuccess = false\n  } = config;\n source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, value => {\n        if (resetOnSuccess) {\n          soFar = 0;\n        }\n        subscriber.next(value);\n      }, undefined, err => {\n from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) {}\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n        this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n        this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n            title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n            role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            status: ['', Validators.required]   // ✅ new status field\r\n        });\r\n\r\n        this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe({\r\n                    next: account => {\r\n                        if (!account) {\r\n                            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\r\n                            this.router.navigateByUrl('/account');\r\n                            return;\r\n                        }\r\n                        this.form.patchValue(account);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    },\r\n                    error: error => {\r\n                        this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // convenience getter\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        let saveAccount;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id!, this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        saveAccount()\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts'], { relativeTo: this.route });\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n {"ast":null,"code":"import { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nexport function scanInternals(accumulator, seed, hasSeed, emitOnNext, emitBeforeComplete) {\n  return (source, subscriber) => {\n    let hasState = hasSeed;\n    let state = seed;\n    let index = 0;\n    source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, value => {\n      const i = index++;\n      state = hasState ? accumulator(state, value, i) : (hasState = true, value);\n      emitOnNext && subscriber.next(state);\n    }, emitBeforeComplete && (() => {\n      hasState && subscriber.next(state);\n      subscriber.complete();\n    })));\n  };\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["createOperatorSubscriber","scanInternals","accumulator","seed","hasSeed","emitOnNext","emitBeforeComplete","source","subscriber","hasState","state","index","subscribe","value","i","next","complete"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/operators/scanInternals.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nexport function scanInternals(accumulator, seed, hasSeed, emitOnNext, emitBeforeComplete) {\n    return (source, subscriber) => {\n        let hasState = hasSeed;\n        let state = seed;\n        let index = 0;\n        source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, (value) => {\n            const i = index++;\n            state = hasState\n                ?\n                    accumulator(state, value, i)\n                :\n                    ((hasState = true), value);\n            emitOnNext && subscriber.next(state);\n        }, emitBeforeComplete &&\n            (() => {\n                hasState && subscriber.next(state);\n                subscriber.complete();\n            })));\n    };\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,SAASA,wBAAwB,QAAQ,sBAAsB;AAC/D,OAAO,SAASC,aAAa,CAACC,WAAW,EAAEC,IAAI,EAAEC,OAAO,EAAEC,UAAU,EAAEC,kBAAkB,EAAE;EACtF,OAAO,CAACC,MAAM,EAAEC,UAAU,KAAK;IAC3B,IAAIC,QAAQ,GAAGL,OAAO;IACtB,IAAIM,KAAK,GAAGP,IAAI;IAChB,IAAIQ,KAAK,GAAG,CAAC;IACbJ,MAAM,CAACK,SAAS,CAACZ,wBAAwB,CAACQ,UAAU,EAAGK,KAAK,IAAK;MAC7D,MAAMC,CAAC,GAAGH,KAAK,EAAE;MACjBD,KAAK,GAAGD,QAAQ,GAERP,WAAW,CAACQ,KAAK,EAAEG,KAAK,EAAEC,CAAC,CAAC,IAE1BL,QAAQ,GAAG,IAAI,EAAGI,KAAK,CAAC;MAClCR,UAAU,IAAIG,UAAU,CAACO,IAAI,CAACL,KAAK,CAAC;IACxC,CAAC,EAAEJ,kBAAkB,KAChB,MAAM;MACHG,QAAQ,IAAID,UAAU,CAACO,IAAI,CAACL,KAAK,CAAC;MAClCF,UAAU,CAACQ,QAAQ,EAAE;IACzB,CAAC,CAAC,CAAC,CAAC;EACZ,CAAC;AACL","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

{"ast":null,"code":"import { operate } from '../util/lift';\nimport { noop } from '../util/noop';\nimport { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nimport { innerFrom } from '../observable/innerFrom';\nexport function bufferWhen(closingSelector) {\n  return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n    let buffer = null;\n    let closingSubscriber = null;\n    const openBuffer = () => {\n      closingSubscriber === null || closingSubscriber === void 0 ? void 0 : closingSubscriber.unsubscribe();\n      const b = buffer;\n      buffer = [];\n      b && subscriber.next(b);\n      innerFrom(closingSelector()).subscribe(closingSubscriber = createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, openBuffer, noop));\n    };\n    openBuffer();\n    source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, value => buffer === null || buffer === void 0 ? void 0 : buffer.push(value), () => {\n      buffer && subscriber.next(buffer);\n      subscriber.complete();\n    }, undefined, () => buffer = closingSubscriber = null));\n  });\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["operate","noop","createOperatorSubscriber","innerFrom","bufferWhen","closingSelector","source","subscriber","buffer","closingSubscriber","openBuffer","unsubscribe","b","next","subscribe","value","push","complete","undefined"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/operators/bufferWhen.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { operate } from '../util/lift';\nimport { noop } from '../util/noop';\nimport { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nimport { innerFrom } from '../observable/innerFrom';\nexport function bufferWhen(closingSelector) {\n    return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n        let buffer = null;\n        let closingSubscriber = null;\n        const openBuffer = () => {\n            closingSubscriber === null || closingSubscriber === void 0 ? {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      status: ['', Validators.required] // ✅ new status field\n    });\n\n 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          if (!account) {\n            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\n            this.router.navigateByUrl('/account');\n            return;\n          }\n          this.form.patchValue(account);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: error => {\n          this.alertService.error(error);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // convenience getter\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    let saveAccount;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id, this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    saveAccount().pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['../'], {\n          relativeTo: this.route\n        });\n      },\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) {}\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n        this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n        this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n            title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n            role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            status: ['', Validators.required]   // ✅ new status field\r\n        });\r\n\r\n        this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe({\r\n                    next: account => {\r\n                        if (!account) {\r\n                            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\r\n                            this.router.navigateByUrl('/account');\r\n                            return;\r\n                        }\r\n                        this.form.patchValue(account);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    },\r\n                    error: error => {\r\n                        this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // convenience getter\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        let saveAccount;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id!, this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        saveAccount()\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigate(['../'], { relativeTo: this.route });\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n    <div {"ast":null,"code":"import { Subscription } from '../Subscription';\nexport const animationFrameProvider = {\n  schedule(callback) {\n    let request = requestAnimationFrame;\n    let cancel = cancelAnimationFrame;\n    const {\n      delegate\n    } = animationFrameProvider;\n    if (delegate) {\n      request = delegate.requestAnimationFrame;\n      cancel = delegate.cancelAnimationFrame;\n    }\n    const handle = request(timestamp => {\n      cancel = undefined;\n      callback(timestamp);\n    });\n    return new Subscription(() => cancel === null || cancel === void 0 ? this.accountService.update(this.id, this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      request$ = this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    request$.pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) {}\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n  this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n  const passwordValidators = this.id ? [Validators.minLength(6)] : [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)];\r\n  const confirmValidators = this.id ? [] : [Validators.required];\r\n\r\n  this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n    title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n    firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n    lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n    email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n    role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n    status: ['', Validators.required],\r\n    password: ['', passwordValidators],\r\n    confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\r\n    }, \r\n    { validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword') });\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n        this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe({\r\n                    next: account => {\r\n                        if (!account) {\r\n                            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\r\n                            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n                            return;\r\n                        }\r\n                        this.form.patchValue(account);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    },\r\n                    error: error => {\r\n                        this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ✅ shortcut for easy access to form fields in template\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        let request$;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id!, this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            request$ = this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        request$\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']); // ✅ always go back to accounts list\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\"
