MustMatch(controlName, matchingControlName) {\n  return formGroup => {\n    const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\n    const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\n    if (!control || !matchingControl) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    // if some other validator has already set an error on matchingControl, do nothing\n    if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\n      matchingControl.setErrors({\n        ...matchingControl.errors,\n        mustMatch: true\n      });\n      return {\n        mustMatch: true\n      };\n    } else {\n      if (matchingControl.errors) {\n        const {\n          mustMatch,\n          ...otherErrors\n        } = matchingControl.errors;\n        const newErrors = Object.keys(otherErrors).length ? otherErrors : null;\n        matchingControl.setErrors(newErrors);\n      } else {\n        matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n      }\n      return null;\n    }\n  };\n}\n// --------------------------------------------------------------------\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.isAddMode = true;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    // read id from route: if present -> edit mode; otherwise add mode\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    this.isAddMode = !this.id;\n    // build form\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      // password required only when adding a new account\n      password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(this.isAddMode ? [Validators.required] : [])]],\n      confirmPassword: ['']\n    }, {\n      // form-level validator for matching password and confirmPassword\n      validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\n    });\n    if (!this.isAddMode) {\n      // load account and patch the form (do not set password/confirmPassword)\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          // patch only the fields we want (avoid patching password)\n          this.form.patchValue({\n            title: account.title ?? '',\n            firstName: account.firstName ?? '',\n            lastName: account.lastName ?? '',\n            email: account.email ?? '',\n            role: account.role ?? ''\n          });\n        },\n        error: err => {\n          this.alertService.error(err);\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    // stop if the form is invalid\n    if (this.form.invalid) {\n      return;\n    }\n    this.loading = true;\n    // copy form value so we can mutate before sending\n    const raw = {\n      ...this.form.value\n    };\n    // If editing and password is empty (user didn't change it) remove it so backend won't overwrite\n    if (!this.isAddMode) {\n      if (!raw.password || raw.password.toString().trim() === '') {\n        delete raw.password;\n        delete raw.confirmPassword;\n      }\n      this.updateAccount(this.id, raw);\n    } else {\n      // creating - password must exist (frontend validation already enforces this)\n      // remove confirmPassword before sending\n      delete raw.confirmPassword;\n      this.createAccount(raw);\n    }\n  }\n  createAccount(data) {\n    this.accountService.create(data).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success('Account created', {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        // navigate back to list (adjust route as needed)\n        this.router.navigate(['../'], {\n          relativeTo: this.route\n        });\n      },\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.loading = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n  updateAccount(id, data) {\n    this.accountService.update(id, data).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success('Account updated', {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['../../'], {\n          relativeTo: this.route\n        }); // adjust if your route tree differs\n      },\n\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.loading = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || MAAAA,iBAAK;MACpBA,qEA0DO;MAEPA,iEAEM;;;MA/DFA,eAAW;MAAXA,+BAAW;MACRA,eAAc;MAAdA,mCAAc;MA4DfA,eAAa;MAAbA,kCAAa","names":["Validators","first","i0","MustMatch","controlName","matchingControlName","formGroup","control","controls","matchingControl","errors","value","setErrors","mustMatch","otherErrors","newErrors","Object","keys","length","AddEditComponent","constructor","formBuilder","route","router","accountService","alertService","ngOnInit","id","snapshot","params","isAddMode","form","group","title","required","firstName","lastName","email","role","password","minLength","confirmPassword","validator","getById","pipe","subscribe","next","account","patchValue","error","err","f","onSubmit","submitted","clear","invalid","loading","raw","toString","trim","updateAccount","createAccount","data","create","success","keepAfterRouteChange","navigate","relativeTo","update","selectors","decls","vars","consts","template"],"sourceRoot":"","sources":["C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.ts","C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.html"],"sourcesContent":["import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';\r\nimport { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services'; // adjust path if needed\r\n\r\n// ----------------- MustMatch validator (cross-field) -----------------\r\nimport { AbstractControl, ValidationErrors } from '@angular/forms';\r\n\r\nexport function MustMatch(controlName: string, matchingControlName: string) {\r\n  return (formGroup: FormGroup): ValidationErrors | null => {\r\n    const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\r\n    const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\r\n\r\n    if (!control || !matchingControl) {\r\n      return null;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // if some other validator has already set an error on matchingControl, do nothing\r\n    if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors['mustMatch']) {\r\n      return null;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    if (control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\r\n      matchingControl.setErrors({ ...matchingControl.errors, mustMatch: true });\r\n      return { mustMatch: true };\r\n    } else {\r\n      if (matchingControl.errors) {\r\n        const { mustMatch, ...otherErrors } = matchingControl.errors as any;\r\n        const newErrors = Object.keys(otherErrors).length ? otherErrors : null;\r\n        matchingControl.setErrors(newErrors);\r\n      } else {\r\n        matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n      }\r\n      return null;\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n}\r\n// --------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n  form!: FormGroup;\r\n  id?: string;\r\n  isAddMode = true;\r\n  loading = false;\r\n  submitted = false;\r\n\r\n  constructor(\r\n    private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n    private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n    private router: Router,\r\n    private accountService: AccountService,\r\n    private alertService: AlertService\r\n  ) {}\r\n\r\n  ngOnInit(): void {\r\n    // read id from route: if present -> edit mode; otherwise add mode\r\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n    this.isAddMode = !this.id;\r\n\r\n    // build form\r\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n      // password required only when adding a new account\r\n      password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(this.isAddMode ? [Validators.required] : [])]],\r\n      confirmPassword: ['']\r\n    }, {\r\n      // form-level validator for matching password and confirmPassword\r\n      validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\r\n    });\r\n\r\n    if (!this.isAddMode) {\r\n      // load account and patch the form (do not set password/confirmPassword)\r\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id!)\r\n        .pipe(first())\r\n        .subscribe({\r\n          next: account => {\r\n            // patch only the fields we want (avoid patching password)\r\n            this.form.patchValue({\r\n              title: account.title ?? '',\r\n              firstName: account.firstName ?? '',\r\n              lastName: account.lastName ?? '',\r\n              email: account.email ?? '',\r\n              role: account.role ?? ''\r\n            });\r\n          },\r\n          error: err => {\r\n            this.alertService.error(err);\r\n          }\r\n        });\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\r\n  get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n  onSubmit(): void {\r\n    this.submitted = true;\r\n    this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n    // stop if the form is invalid\r\n    if (this.form.invalid) {\r\n      return;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    this.loading = true;\r\n\r\n    // copy form value so we can mutate before sending\r\n    const raw = { ...this.form.value };\r\n\r\n    // If editing and password is empty (user didn't change it) remove it so backend won't overwrite\r\n    if (!this.isAddMode) {\r\n      if (!raw.password || raw.password.toString().trim() === '') {\r\n        delete raw.password;\r\n        delete raw.confirmPassword;\r\n      }\r\n      this.updateAccount(this.id!, raw);\r\n    } else {\r\n      // creating - password must exist (frontend validation already enforces this)\r\n      // remove confirmPassword before sending\r\n      delete raw.confirmPassword;\r\n      this.createAccount(raw);\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  private createAccount(data: any) {\r\n    this.accountService.create(data)\r\n      .pipe(first())\r\n      .subscribe({\r\n        next: () => {\r\n          this.alertService.success('Account created', { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n          // navigate back to list (adjust route as needed)\r\n          this.router.navigate(['../'], { relativeTo: this.route });\r\n        },\r\n        error: error => {\r\n          this.alertService.error(error);\r\n          this.loading = false;\r\n        }\r\n      });\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  private updateAccount(id: string, data: any) {\r\n    this.accountService.update(id, data)\r\n      .pipe(first())\r\n      .subscribe({\r\n        next: () => {\r\n          this.alertService.success('Account updated', { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n          this.router.navigate(['../../'], { relativeTo: this.route }); // adjust if your route tree differs\r\n        },\r\n        error: error => {\r\n          this.alertService.error(error);\r\n          this.loading = false;\r\n        }\r\n      });\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n  <div class=\"row\">\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Title</label>\r\n      <select formControlName=\"title\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.title.errors }\">\r\n        <option value=\"\">-- Select --</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mr\">Mr</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mrs\">Mrs</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Miss\">Miss</option>\r\n      </select>\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.title.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Title is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">First Name</label>\r\n      <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"firstName\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.firstName.errors }\" />\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.firstName.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">First Name is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Last Name</label>\r\n      <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"lastName\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.lastName.errors }\" />\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.lastName.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Last Name is required</div>\r\n    </div>\r\n  </div>\r\n\r\n  <div class=\"mb-3\">\r\n    <label class=\"form-label\">Email</label>\r\n    <input type=\"text\" formControlName=\"email\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.email.errors }\" />\r\n    <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.email.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Valid Email is required</div>\r\n  </div>\r\n\r\n  <div class=\"mb-3\">\r\n    <label class=\"form-label\">Role</label>\r\n    <select formControlName=\"role\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.role.errors }\">\r\n      <option value=\"\">-- Select Role --</option>\r\n      <option value=\"Admin\">Admin</option>\r\n      <option value=\"User\">User</option>\r\n    </select>\r\n    <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.role.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Role is required</div>\r\n  </div>\r\n\r\n  <!-- ✅ Status field -->\r\n  <div class=\"mb-3\">\r\n    <label class=\"form-label\">Status</label>\r\n    <select formControlName=\"status\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.status.errors }\">\r\n      <option value=\"\">-- Select Status --</option>\r\n      <option value=\"active\">Active</option>\r\n      <option value=\"inactive\">Inactive</option>\r\n    </select>\r\n    <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.status.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">Status is required</div>\r\n  </div>\r\n\r\n  <div class=\"mb-3\">\r\n    <button [disabled]=\"submitting\" class=\"btn btn-primary\">\r\n      <span *ngIf=\"submitting\" class=\"spinner-border spinner-border-sm me-1\"></span>\r\n      Save\r\n    </button>\r\n    <a routerLink=\"/admin/accounts\" class=\"btn btn-link\">Cancel</a>\r\n  </div>\r\n</form>\r\n\r\n<div *ngIf=\"loading\" class=\"text-center m-3\">\r\n  <span class=\"spinner-border spinner-border-lg\"></span>\r\n</div>\r\n"]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

{"ast":null,"code":"import { Validators } from '@angular/forms';\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\nimport { MustMatch } from '@app/_helpers';\nimport * as i0 from \"@angular/core\";\nimport *   i0.ɵɵelementEnd();\n  }\n}\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false; // controls showing spinner vs. form\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      // password only required in add mode\n      password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(!this.id ? [Validators.required] : [])]],\n      confirmPassword: ['']\n    }, {\n      validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\n    });\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      // edit mode: load account and show spinner while loading\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: x => {\n          this.form.patchValue(x);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: err => {\n          this.alertService.error(err);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    let saveAccount;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id, this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    saveAccount().pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigateByUrl('/account'); // ✅ back to account list\n      },\n\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.html"],"sourcesContent":["import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';\r\nimport { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\nimport { MustMatch } from '@app/_helpers';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;     // controls showing spinner vs. form\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) {}\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n        this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n        this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n            title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n            role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            // password only required in add mode\r\n            password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(!this.id ? [Validators.required] : [])]],\r\n            confirmPassword: ['']\r\n        }, {\r\n            validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\r\n        });\r\n\r\n        this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            // edit mode: load account and show spinner while loading\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe({\r\n                    next: x => {\r\n                        this.form.patchValue(x);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    },\r\n                    error: err => {\r\n                        this.alertService.error(err);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        let saveAccount;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id!, this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        saveAccount()\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigateByUrl('/account');   // ✅ back to account list\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{title}}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n    <div class=\"row\">\r\n        <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n            <label class=\"form-label\">Title</label>\r\n            <select formControlName=\"title\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{      <div class=\"mb-3 col-5\">\r\n            <label class=\"form-label\">Role</label>\r\n            <select formControlName=\"role\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.role.errors }\">\r\n                <option value=\"\"></option>\r\n                <option value=\"User\">User</option>\r\n                <option value=\"Admin\">Admin</option>\r\n class=\"row\">\r\n        <div class=\"mb-3 col\">\r\n            <label class=\"form-label\">Password</label>\r\n            <input type=\"password\" formControlName=\"password\" class=\"form-control\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.password.errors }\" />\r\n            <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.password.errors\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">\r\n                <div *ngIf=\"f.password.errors.required\">Password is required</div>\r\n                <div *ngIf=\"f.password.errors.minlength\">Password must be at least 6 characters</div>\r\n            </div>\r\n        </div>\r\n        <div class=\"mb-3 col\">\r\n            <label class=\"form-label\">Confirm Password</label>\r\n            <input type=\"password\" class=\"invalid-feedback\">\r\n                <div *ngIf=\"f.confirmPassword.errors.required\">Confirm Password is required</div>\r\n                <div routerLink=\"/admin/accounts\" class=\"btn btn-link\">Cancel</a>\r\n    </div>\r\n</form>\r\n<div *ngIf=\"loading\" class=\"text-center m-5\">\r\n    <span class=\"spinner-border spinner-border-lg {"ast":null,"code":"import { scheduleObservable } from './scheduleObservable';\nimport { schedulePromise } from './schedulePromise';\nimport { scheduleArray } from './scheduleArray';\nimport { scheduleIterable } from './scheduleIterable';\nimport { scheduleAsyncIterable } from './scheduleAsyncIterable';\nimport { isInteropObservable } from '../util/isInteropObservable';\nimport { isPromise } from '../util/isPromise';\nimport { isArrayLike } from '../util/isArrayLike';\nimport { isIterable } from '../util/isIterable';\nimport { isAsyncIterable } from '../util/isAsyncIterable';\nimport { createInvalidObservableTypeError } from '../util/throwUnobservableError';\nimport { isReadableStreamLike } from '../util/isReadableStreamLike';\nimport { scheduleReadableStreamLike } from './scheduleReadableStreamLike';\nexport function scheduled(input, scheduler) {\n  if (input != null) {\n    if (isInteropObservable(input)) {\n      return scheduleObservable(input, scheduler);\n    }\n    if (isArrayLike(input)) {\n      return scheduleArray(input, scheduler);\n    }\n    if (isPromise(input)) {\n      return schedulePromise(input, scheduler);\n    }\n    if (isAsyncIterable(input)) {\n      return scheduleAsyncIterable(input, scheduler);\n    }\n    if (isIterable(input)) {\n      return scheduleIterable(input, scheduler);\n    }\n    if (isReadableStreamLike(input)) {\n      return scheduleReadableStreamLike(input, scheduler);\n    }\n  }\n  throw createInvalidObservableTypeError(input);\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["scheduleObservable","schedulePromise","scheduleArray","scheduleIterable","scheduleAsyncIterable","isInteropObservable","isPromise","isArrayLike","isIterable","isAsyncIterable","createInvalidObservableTypeError","isReadableStreamLike","scheduleReadableStreamLike","scheduled","input","scheduler"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith schedulePromise } from './schedulePromise';\nimport { scheduleArray } from './scheduleArray';\nimport { scheduleIterable } from './scheduleIterable';\nimport { scheduleAsyncIterable } from './scheduleAsyncIterable';\nimport { isInteropObservable } from '../util/isInteropObservable';\nimport { isPromise } from '../util/isPromise';\nimport { isArrayLike } from '../util/isArrayLike';\nimport { isIterable } from '../util/isIterable';\nimport { isAsyncIterable } from '../util/isAsyncIterable';\nimport { createInvalidObservableTypeError } from '../util/throwUnobservableError';\nimport { isReadableStreamLike } from '../util/isReadableStreamLike';\nimport { scheduleReadableStreamLike } from './scheduleReadableStreamLike';\nexport function scheduled(input, scheduler) {\n    if (input != null) {\n        if (isInteropObservable(input)) {\n            return scheduleObservable(input, scheduler);\n        }\n        if (isArrayLike(input)) {\n            return scheduleArray(input, scheduler);\n        }\n        if (isPromise(input)) {\n            return schedulePromise(input, scheduler);\n        }\n        if (isAsyncIterable(input)) {\n            return scheduleAsyncIterable(input, scheduler);\n        }\n        if (isIterable(input)) {\n            return scheduleIterable(input, scheduler);\n        }\n        if (isReadableStreamLike(input)) {\n            return scheduleReadableStreamLike(input, scheduler);\n        }\n    }\n    throw createInvalidObservableTypeError(input);\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,SAASA,kBAAkB,QAAQ,sBAAsB;AACzD,SAASC,eAAe,QAAQ,mBAAmB;AACnD,SAASC,aAAa,QAAQ,iBAAiB;AAC/C,SAASC,gBAAgB,QAAQ,oBAAoB;AACrD,SAASC,qBAAqB,QAAQ,yBAAyB;AAC/D,SAASC,mBAAmB,QAAQ,6BAA6B;AACjE,SAASC,SAAS,QAAQ,mBAAmB;AAC7C,SAASC,WAAW,QAAQ,qBAAqB;AACjD,SAASC,UAAU,QAAQ,oBAAoB;AAC/C,SAASC,eAAe,QAAQ,yBAAyB;AACzD,SAASC,gCAAgC,QAAQ,gCAAgC;AACjF,SAASC,oBAAoB,QAAQ,8BAA8B;AACnE,SAASC,0BAA0B,QAAQ,8BAA8B;AACzE,OAAO,SAASC,SAAS,CAACC,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,EAAE;EACxC,IAAID,KAAK,IAAI,IAAI,EAAE;IACf,IAAIT,mBAAmB,CAACS,KAAK,CAAC,EAAE;MAC5B,OAAOd,kBAAkB,CAACc,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,CAAC;IAC/C;IACA,IAAIR,WAAW,CAACO,KAAK,CAAC,EAAE;MACpB,OAAOZ,aAAa,CAACY,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,CAAC;IAC1C;IACA,IAAIT,SAAS,CAACQ,KAAK,CAAC,EAAE;MAClB,OAAOb,eAAe,CAACa,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,CAAC;IAC5C;IACA,IAAIN,eAAe,CAACK,KAAK,CAAC,EAAE;MACxB,OAAOV,qBAAqB,CAACU,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,CAAC;IAClD;IACA,IAAIP,UAAU,CAACM,KAAK,CAAC,EAAE;MACnB,OAAOX,gBAAgB,CAACW,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,CAAC;IAC7C;IACA,IAAIJ,oBAAoB,CAACG,KAAK,CAAC,EAAE;MAC7B,OAAOF,0BAA0B,CAACE,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,CAAC;IACvD;EACJ;EACA,MAAML,gCAAgC,CAACI,KAAK,CAAC;AACjD","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

{"ast":null,"code":"export function executeSchedule(parentSubscription, scheduler, work, delay = 0, repeat = false) {\n  const scheduleSubscription = scheduler.schedule(function () {\n    work();\n    if (repeat) {\n      parentSubscription.add(this.schedule(null, delay));\n    } else {\n      this.unsubscribe();\n    }\n  }, delay);\n  parentSubscription.add(scheduleSubscription);\n  if (!repeat) {\n    return scheduleSubscription;\n  }\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["executeSchedule","parentSubscription","scheduler","work","delay","repeat","scheduleSubscription","schedule","add","unsubscribe"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/util/executeSchedule.js"],"sourcesContent":["export function executeSchedule(parentSubscription, scheduler, work, delay = 0, repeat = false) {\n    const scheduleSubscription = scheduler.schedule(function () {\n        work();\n        if (repeat) {\n            parentSubscription.add(this.schedule(null, delay));\n        }\n        else {\n            this.unsubscribe();\n        }\n    }, delay);\n    parentSubscription.add(scheduleSubscription);\n    if (!repeat) {\n        return scheduleSubscription;\n    }\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,OAAO,SAASA,eAAe,CAACC,kBAAkB,EAAEC,SAAS,EAAEC,IAAI,EAAEC,KAAK,GAAG,CAAC,EAAEC,MAAM,GAAG,KAAK,EAAE;EAC5F,MAAMC,oBAAoB,GAAGJ,SAAS,CAACK,QAAQ,CAAC,YAAY;IACxDJ,IAAI,EAAE;IACN,IAAIE,MAAM,EAAE;MACRJ,kBAAkB,CAACO,GAAG,CAAC,IAAI,CAACD,QAAQ,CAAC,IAAI,EAAEH,KAAK,CAAC,CAAC;IACtD,CAAC,MACI;MACD,IAAI,CAACK,WAAW,EAAE;IACtB;EACJ,CAAC,EAAEL,KAAK,CAAC;EACTH,kBAAkB,CAACO,GAAG,CAACF,oBAAoB,CAAC;EAC5C,IAAI,CAACD,MAAM,EAAE;IACT,OAAOC,oBAAoB;EAC/B;AACJ","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

{\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    // ✅ include status field in the form\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      status: ['', Validators.required]\n    });\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          if (!account) {\n            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\n            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n            return;\n          }\n          this.form.patchValue(account);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: error => {\n          this.alertService.error(error);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // ✅ shortcut for easy access to form fields in template\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    let request$;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id, this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      request$ = this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    request$.pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']); // ✅ always go back to accounts list\n      },\n\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || AddEditComponent)(i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i1.FormBuilder), i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i2.ActivatedRoute), .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']); // ✅ always go back to accounts list\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n {"ast":null,"code":"import { concat } from '../observable/concat';\nimport { popScheduler } from '../util/args';\nimport { operate } from '../util/lift';\nexport function startWith(...values) {\n  const scheduler = popScheduler(values);\n  return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n    (scheduler ? concat(values, source, scheduler) : concat(values, source)).subscribe(subscriber);\n  });\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["concat","popScheduler","operate","startWith","values","scheduler","source","subscriber","subscribe"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/operators/startWith.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { concat } from '../observable/concat';\nimport { popScheduler } from '../util/args';\nimport { operate } from '../util/lift';\nexport function startWith(...values) {\n    const scheduler = popScheduler(values);\n    return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n        (scheduler ? concat(values, source, scheduler) : concat(values, source)).subscribe(subscriber);\n    });\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,SAASA,MAAM,QAAQ,sBAAsB;AAC7C,SAASC,YAAY,QAAQ,cAAc;AAC3C,SAASC,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc;AACtC,OAAO,SAASC,SAAS,CAAC,GAAGC,MAAM,EAAE;EACjC,MAAMC,SAAS,GAAGJ,YAAY,CAACG,MAAM,CAAC;EACtC,OAAOF,OAAO,CAAC,CAACI,MAAM,EAAEC,UAAU,KAAK;IACnC,CAACF,SAAS,GAAGL,MAAM,CAACI,MAAM,EAAEE,MAAM,EAAED,SAAS,CAAC,GAAGL,MAAM,CAACI,MAAM,EAAEE,MAAM,CAAC,EAAEE,SAAS,CAACD,UAAU,CAAC;EAClG,CAAC,CAAC;AACN","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

true;\r\n        this.accountService.delete(id)\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe(() => {\r\n                this.accounts = this.accounts!.filter(x => x.id !== id)\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}","<h1>Accounts</h1>\r\n<p>All accounts from secure (admin only) api end point:</p>\r\n<a routerLink=\"add\" class=\"btn btn-sm btn-success mb-2\">Create Account</a>\r\n<table   i0.ɵɵelementEnd();\n  }\n}\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      // password only required in add mode\n      password: from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\nimport { MustMatch } from '@app/_helpers';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) { }\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n        this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n        this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n            title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n            role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            // password only required in add mode\r\n            password: ['', [Validators.minLength(6), ...(!this.id ? [Validators.required] : [])]],\r\n            confirmPassword: ['']\r\n        }, {\r\n            validator: MustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\r\n        });\r\n\r\n        this.title = 'Create Account';\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            // edit mode\r\n            this.title = 'Edit Account';\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe(x => {\r\n                    this.form.patchValue(x);\r\n                    this.loading = false;\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // convenience getter for easy access to form fields\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n\r\n        // reset alerts on submit\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        // stop here if form is invalid\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) {\r\n            return;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        // create or update account based on id param\r\n        let saveAccount;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id!, this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        saveAccount()\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigateByUrl('/admin/accounts');\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}","<h1>{{title}}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n    <div class=\"row\">\r\n        <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n            <label {"ast":null,"code":"import { asyncScheduler } from '../scheduler/async';\nimport { operate } from '../util/lift';\nimport { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nexport function timeInterval(scheduler = asyncScheduler) {\n  return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n    let last = scheduler.now();\n    source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, value => {\n      const now = scheduler.now();\n      const interval = now - last;\n      last = now;\n      subscriber.next(new TimeInterval(value, interval));\n    }));\n  });\n}\nexport class TimeInterval {\n  constructor(value, interval) {\n    this.value = value;\n    this.interval = interval;\n  }\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["asyncScheduler","operate","createOperatorSubscriber","timeInterval","scheduler","source","subscriber","last","now","subscribe","value","interval","next","TimeInterval","constructor"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/operators/timeInterval.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { asyncScheduler } from '../scheduler/async';\nimport { operate } from '../util/lift';\nimport { createOperatorSubscriber } from './OperatorSubscriber';\nexport function timeInterval(scheduler = asyncScheduler) {\n    return operate((source, subscriber) => {\n        let last = scheduler.now();\n        source.subscribe(createOperatorSubscriber(subscriber, (value) => {\n            const now = scheduler.now();\n            const interval = now - last;\n            last = now;\n            subscriber.next(new TimeInterval(value, interval));\n        }));\n    });\n}\nexport class TimeInterval {\n    constructor(value, interval) {\n        this.value = value;\n        this.interval = interval;\n    }\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,SAASA,cAAc,QAAQ,oBAAoB;AACnD,SAASC,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc;AACtC,SAASC,wBAAwB,QAAQ,sBAAsB;AAC/D,OAAO,SAASC,YAAY,CAACC,SAAS,GAAGJ,cAAc,EAAE;EACrD,OAAOC,OAAO,CAAC,CAACI,MAAM,EAAEC,UAAU,KAAK;IACnC,IAAIC,IAAI,GAAGH,SAAS,CAACI,GAAG,EAAE;IAC1BH,MAAM,CAACI,SAAS,CAACP,wBAAwB,CAACI,UAAU,EAAGI,KAAK,IAAK;MAC7D,MAAMF,GAAG,GAAGJ,SAAS,CAACI,GAAG,EAAE;MAC3B,MAAMG,QAAQ,GAAGH,GAAG,GAAGD,IAAI;MAC3BA,IAAI,GAAGC,GAAG;MACVF,UAAU,CAACM,IAAI,CAAC,IAAIC,YAAY,CAACH,KAAK,EAAEC,QAAQ,CAAC,CAAC;IACtD,CAAC,CAAC,CAAC;EACP,CAAC,CAAC;AACN;AACA,OAAO,MAAME,YAAY,CAAC;EACtBC,WAAW,CAACJ,KAAK,EAAEC,QAAQ,EAAE;IACzB,IAAI,CAACD,KAAK,GAAGA,KAAK;IAClB,IAAI,CAACC,QAAQ,GAAGA,QAAQ;EAC5B;AACJ","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

{"ast":null,"code":"import { isFunction } from './isFunction';\nexport function hasLift(source) {\n  return isFunction(source === null || source === void 0 ? void 0 : source.lift);\n}\nexport function operate(init) {\n  return source => {\n    if (hasLift(source)) {\n      return source.lift(function (liftedSource) {\n        try {\n          return init(liftedSource, this);\n        } catch (err) {\n          this.error(err);\n        }\n      });\n    }\n    throw new TypeError('Unable to lift unknown Observable type');\n  };\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["isFunction","hasLift","source","lift","operate","init","liftedSource","err","error","TypeError"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/util/lift.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { isFunction } from './isFunction';\nexport function hasLift(source) {\n    return isFunction(source === null || source === void 0 ? void 0 : source.lift);\n}\nexport function operate(init) {\n    return (source) => {\n        if (hasLift(source)) {\n            return source.lift(function (liftedSource) {\n                try {\n                    return init(liftedSource, this);\n                }\n                catch (err) {\n                    this.error(err);\n                }\n            });\n        }\n        throw new TypeError('Unable to lift unknown Observable type');\n    };\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,SAASA,UAAU,QAAQ,cAAc;AACzC,OAAO,SAASC,OAAO,CAACC,MAAM,EAAE;EAC5B,OAAOF,UAAU,CAACE,MAAM,KAAK,IAAI,IAAIA,MAAM,KAAK,KAAK,CAAC,GAAG,KAAK,CAAC,GAAGA,MAAM,CAACC,IAAI,CAAC;AAClF;AACA,OAAO,SAASC,OAAO,CAACC,IAAI,EAAE;EAC1B,OAAQH,MAAM,IAAK;IACf,IAAID,OAAO,CAACC,MAAM,CAAC,EAAE;MACjB,OAAOA,MAAM,CAACC,IAAI,CAAC,UAAUG,YAAY,EAAE;QACvC,IAAI;UACA,OAAOD,IAAI,CAACC,YAAY,EAAE,IAAI,CAAC;QACnC,CAAC,CACD,OAAOC,GAAG,EAAE;UACR,IAAI,CAACC,KAAK,CAACD,GAAG,CAAC;QACnB;MACJ,CAAC,CAAC;IACN;IACA,MAAM,IAAIE,SAAS,CAAC,wCAAwC,CAAC;EACjE,CAAC;AACL","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}

{"ast":null,"code":"// The error overlay is inspired (and mostly copied) from Create React App (https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app)\n// They, in turn, got inspired by webpack-hot-middleware (https://github.com/glenjamin/webpack-hot-middleware).\nimport ansiHTML from \"ansi-html-community\";\nimport { encode } from \"html-entities\";\nvar colors = {\n  reset: [\"transparent\", \"transparent\"],\n  black: \"181818\",\n  red: \"E36049\",\n  green: \"B3CB74\",\n  yellow: \"FFD080\",\n  blue: \"7CAFC2\",\n  magenta: \"7FACCA\",\n  cyan: \"C3C2EF\",\n  lightgrey: \"EBE7E3\",\n  darkgrey: \"6D7891\"\n};\n/** @type {HTMLIFrameElement | null | undefined} */\n\nvar iframeContainerElement;\n/** @type {HTMLDivElement | null | undefined} */\n\nvar containerElement;\n/** @type {Array<(element: HTMLDivElement) => void>} */\n\nvar onLoadQueue = [];\n/** @type {TrustedTypePolicy | undefined} */\n\nvar overlayTrustedTypesPolicy;\nansiHTML.setColors(colors);\n/**\n * @param {string | null} trustedTypesPolicyName\n */\n\nfunction createContainer(trustedTypesPolicyName) {\n  // Enable Trusted Types if they are available in the current browser.\n  if (window.trustedTypes) {\n    overlayTrustedTypesPolicy = window.trustedTypes.createPolicy(trustedTypesPolicyName || \"webpack-dev-server#overlay\", {\n      createHTML: function createHTML(value) {\n        return value;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n  iframeContainerElement = document.createElement(\"iframe\");\n  iframeContainerElement.id = \"webpack-dev-server-client-overlay\";\n  iframeContainerElement.src = \"about:blank\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.position = \"fixed\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.left = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.top = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.right = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.bottom = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.width = \"100vw\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.height = \"100vh\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.border = \"none\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.zIndex = 9999999999;\n  iframeContainerElement.onload = function () {\n    containerElement = /** @type {Document} */\n\n    /** @type {HTMLIFrameElement} */\n    iframeContainerElement.contentDocument.createElement(\"div\");\n    containerElement.id = \"webpack-dev-server-client-overlay-div\";\n    containerElement.style.position = \"fixed\";\n    containerElement.style.boxSizing = \"border-box\";\n    containerElement.style.left = 0;\n    containerElement.style.top = 0;\n    containerElement.style.right = 0;\n    containerElement.style.bottom = 0;\n    containerElement.style.width = \"100vw\";\n    containerElement.style.height = \"100vh\";\n    containerElement.style.backgroundColor = \"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85)\";\n    containerElement.style.color = \"#E8E8E8\";\n    containerElement.style.fontFamily = \"Menlo, Consolas, monospace\";\n    containerElement.style.fontSize = \"large\";\n    containerElement.style.padding = \"2rem\";\n    containerElement.style.lineHeight = \"1.2\";\n    containerElement.style.whiteSpace = \"pre-wrap\";\n    containerElement.style.overflow = \"auto\";\n    var headerElement = document.createElement(\"span\");\n    headerElement.innerText = \"Compiled with problems:\";\n    var closeButtonElement = document.createElement(\"button\");\n    closeButtonElement.innerText = \"X\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.background = \"transparent\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.border = \"none\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.fontSize = \"20px\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.fontWeight = \"bold\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.color = \"white\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.cursor = \"pointer\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.cssFloat = \"right\"; // @ts-ignore\n\n    closeButtonElement.style.styleFloat = \"right\";\n    closeButtonElement.addEventListener(\"click\", function () {\n      hide();\n    });\n    containerElement.appendChild(headerElement);\n    containerElement.appendChild(closeButtonElement);\n    containerElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n    containerElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n    /** @type {Document} */\n\n    /** @type {HTMLIFrameElement} */\n    iframeContainerElement.contentDocument.body.appendChild(containerElement);\n    onLoadQueue.forEach(function (onLoad) {\n      onLoad( /** @type {HTMLDivElement} */\n      containerElement);\n    });\n    onLoadQueue = [];\n    /** @type {HTMLIFrameElement} */\n\n    iframeContainerElement.onload = null;\n  };\n  document.body.appendChild(iframeContainerElement);\n}\n/**\n * @param {(element: HTMLDivElement) => void} callback\n * @param {string | null} trustedTypesPolicyName\n */\n\nfunction ensureOverlayExists(callback, trustedTypesPolicyName) {\n  if (containerElement) {\n    // Everything is ready, call the callback right away.\n    callback(containerElement);\n    return;\n  }\n  onLoadQueue.push(callback);\n  if (iframeContainerElement) {\n    return;\n  }\n  createContainer(trustedTypesPolicyName);\n} // Successful compilation.\n\nfunction hide() {\n  if (!iframeContainerElement) {\n    return;\n  } // Clean up and reset internal state.\n\n  document.body.removeChild(iframeContainerElement);\n  iframeContainerElement = null;\n  containerElement = null;\n}\n/**\n * @param {string} type\n * @param {string  | { file?: string, moduleName?: string, loc?: string, message?: string }} item\n * @returns {{ header: string, body: string }}\n */\n\nfunction formatProblem(type, item) {\n  var header = type === \"warning\" ? \"WARNING\" : \"ERROR\";\n  var body = \"\";\n  if (typeof item === \"string\") {\n    body += item;\n  } else {\n    var file = item.file || \"\"; // eslint-disable-next-line no-nested-ternary\n\n    var moduleName = item.moduleName ? item.moduleName.indexOf(\"!\") !== -1 ? \"\".concat(item.moduleName.replace(/^(\\s|\\S)*!/, \"\"), \" (\").concat(item.moduleName, \")\") : \"\".concat(item.moduleName) : \"\";\n    var loc = item.loc;\n    header += \"\".concat(moduleName || file ? \" in \".concat(moduleName ? \"\".concat(moduleName).concat(file ? \" (\".concat(file, \")\") : \"\") : file).concat(loc ? \" \".concat(loc) : \"\") : \"\");\n    body += item.message || \"\";\n  }\n  return {\n    header: header,\n    body: body\n  };\n} // Compilation with errors (e.g. syntax error or missing modules).\n\n/**\n * @param {string} type\n * @param {Array<string  | { file?: string, moduleName?: string, loc?: string, message?: string }>} messages\n * @param {string | null} trustedTypesPolicyName\n */\n\nfunction show(type, messages, trustedTypesPolicyName) {\n  ensureOverlayExists(function () {\n    messages.forEach(function (message) {\n      var entryElement = document.createElement(\"div\");\n      var typeElement = document.createElement(\"span\");\n      var _formatProblem = formatProblem(type, message),\n        header = _formatProblem.header,\n        body = _formatProblem.body;\n      typeElement.innerText = header;\n      typeElement.style.color = \"#\".concat(colors.red); // Make it look similar to our terminal.\n\n      var text = ansiHTML(encode(body));\n      var messageTextNode = document.createElement(\"div\");\n      messageTextNode.innerHTML = overlayTrustedTypesPolicy ? overlayTrustedTypesPolicy.createHTML(text) : text;\n      entryElement.appendChild(typeElement);\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      entryElement.appendChild(messageTextNode);\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      /** @type {HTMLDivElement} */\n\n      containerElement.appendChild(entryElement);\n    });\n  }, trustedTypesPolicyName);\n}\nexport { formatProblem, show, hide };","map":{"version":3,"names":["ansiHTML","encode","colors","reset","black","red","green","yellow","blue","magenta","cyan","lightgrey","darkgrey","iframeContainerElement","containerElement","onLoadQueue","overlayTrustedTypesPolicy","setColors","createContainer","trustedTypesPolicyName","window","trustedTypes","createPolicy","createHTML","value","document","createElement","id","src","style","position","left","top","right","bottom","width","height","border","zIndex","onload","contentDocument","boxSizing","backgroundColor","color","fontFamily","fontSize","padding","lineHeight","whiteSpace","overflow","headerElement","innerText","closeButtonElement","background","fontWeight","cursor","cssFloat","styleFloat","addEventListener","hide","appendChild","body","forEach","onLoad","ensureOverlayExists","callback","push","removeChild","formatProblem","type","item","header","file","moduleName","indexOf","concat","replace","loc","message","show","messages","entryElement","typeElement","_formatProblem","text","messageTextNode","innerHTML"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith (https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app)\n// They, in turn, got inspired by webpack-hot-middleware (https://github.com/glenjamin/webpack-hot-middleware).\nimport ansiHTML from \"ansi-html-community\";\nimport { encode } from \"html-entities\";\nvar colors = {\n  reset: [\"transparent\", \"transparent\"],\n  black: \"181818\",\n  red: \"E36049\",\n  green: \"B3CB74\",\n  yellow: \"FFD080\",\n  blue: \"7CAFC2\",\n  magenta: \"7FACCA\",\n  cyan: \"C3C2EF\",\n  lightgrey: \"EBE7E3\",\n  darkgrey: \"6D7891\"\n};\n/** @type {HTMLIFrameElement | null | undefined} */\n\nvar iframeContainerElement;\n/** @type {HTMLDivElement | null | undefined} */\n\nvar containerElement;\n/** @type {Array<(element: HTMLDivElement) => void>} */\n\nvar onLoadQueue = [];\n/** @type {TrustedTypePolicy | undefined} */\n\nvar overlayTrustedTypesPolicy;\nansiHTML.setColors(colors);\n/**\n * @param {string | null} trustedTypesPolicyName\n */\n\nfunction createContainer(trustedTypesPolicyName) {\n  // Enable Trusted Types if they are available in the current browser.\n  if (window.trustedTypes) {\n    overlayTrustedTypesPolicy = window.trustedTypes.createPolicy(trustedTypesPolicyName || \"webpack-dev-server#overlay\", {\n      createHTML: function createHTML(value) {\n        return value;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n\n  iframeContainerElement = document.createElement(\"iframe\");\n  iframeContainerElement.id = \"webpack-dev-server-client-overlay\";\n  iframeContainerElement.src = \"about:blank\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.position = \"fixed\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.left = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.top = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.right = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.bottom = 0;\n  iframeContainerElement.style.width = \"100vw\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.height = \"100vh\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.border = \"none\";\n  iframeContainerElement.style.zIndex = 9999999999;\n\n  iframeContainerElement.onload = function () {\n    containerElement =\n    /** @type {Document} */\n\n    /** @type {HTMLIFrameElement} */\n    iframeContainerElement.contentDocument.createElement(\"div\");\n    containerElement.id = \"webpack-dev-server-client-overlay-div\";\n    containerElement.style.position = \"fixed\";\n    containerElement.style.boxSizing = \"border-box\";\n    containerElement.style.left = 0;\n    containerElement.style.top = 0;\n    containerElement.style.right = 0;\n    containerElement.style.bottom = 0;\n    containerElement.style.width = \"100vw\";\n    containerElement.style.height = \"100vh\";\n    containerElement.style.backgroundColor = \"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85)\";\n    containerElement.style.color = \"#E8E8E8\";\n    containerElement.style.fontFamily = \"Menlo, Consolas, monospace\";\n    containerElement.style.fontSize = \"large\";\n    containerElement.style.padding = \"2rem\";\n    containerElement.style.lineHeight = \"1.2\";\n    containerElement.style.whiteSpace = \"pre-wrap\";\n    containerElement.style.overflow = \"auto\";\n    var headerElement = document.createElement(\"span\");\n    headerElement.innerText = \"Compiled with problems:\";\n    var closeButtonElement = document.createElement(\"button\");\n    closeButtonElement.innerText = \"X\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.background = \"transparent\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.border = \"none\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.fontSize = \"20px\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.fontWeight = \"bold\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.color = \"white\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.cursor = \"pointer\";\n    closeButtonElement.style.cssFloat = \"right\"; // @ts-ignore\n\n    closeButtonElement.style.styleFloat = \"right\";\n    closeButtonElement.addEventListener(\"click\", function () {\n      hide();\n    });\n    containerElement.appendChild(headerElement);\n    containerElement.appendChild(closeButtonElement);\n    containerElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n    containerElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n    /** @type {Document} */\n\n    /** @type {HTMLIFrameElement} */\n    iframeContainerElement.contentDocument.body.appendChild(containerElement);\n    onLoadQueue.forEach(function (onLoad) {\n      onLoad(\n      /** @type {HTMLDivElement} */\n      containerElement);\n    });\n    onLoadQueue = [];\n    /** @type {HTMLIFrameElement} */\n\n    iframeContainerElement.onload = null;\n  };\n\n  document.body.appendChild(iframeContainerElement);\n}\n/**\n * @param {(element: HTMLDivElement) => void} callback\n * @param {string | null} trustedTypesPolicyName\n */\n\n\nfunction ensureOverlayExists(callback, trustedTypesPolicyName) {\n  if (containerElement) {\n    // Everything is ready, call the callback right away.\n    callback(containerElement);\n    return;\n  }\n\n  onLoadQueue.push(callback);\n\n  if (iframeContainerElement) {\n    return;\n  }\n\n  createContainer(trustedTypesPolicyName);\n} // Successful compilation.\n\n\nfunction hide() {\n  if (!iframeContainerElement) {\n    return;\n  } // Clean up and reset internal state.\n\n\n  document.body.removeChild(iframeContainerElement);\n  iframeContainerElement = null;\n  containerElement = null;\n}\n/**\n * @param {string} type\n * @param {string  | { file?: string, moduleName?: string, loc?: string, message?: string }} item\n * @returns {{ header: string, body: string }}\n */\n\n\nfunction formatProblem(type, item) {\n  var header = type === \"warning\" ? \"WARNING\" : \"ERROR\";\n  var body = \"\";\n\n  if (typeof item === \"string\") {\n    body += item;\n  } else {\n    var file = item.file || \"\"; // eslint-disable-next-line no-nested-ternary\n\n    var moduleName = item.moduleName ? item.moduleName.indexOf(\"!\") !== -1 ? \"\".concat(item.moduleName.replace(/^(\\s|\\S)*!/, \"\"), \" (\").concat(item.moduleName, \")\") : \"\".concat(item.moduleName) : \"\";\n    var loc = item.loc;\n    header += \"\".concat(moduleName || file ? \" in \".concat(moduleName ? \"\".concat(moduleName).concat(file ? \" (\".concat(file, \")\") : \"\") : file).concat(loc ? \" \".concat(loc) : \"\") : \"\");\n    body += item.message || \"\";\n  }\n\n  return {\n    header: header,\n    body: body\n  };\n} // Compilation with errors (e.g. syntax error or missing modules).\n\n/**\n * @param {string} type\n * @param {Array<string  | { file?: string, moduleName?: string, loc?: string, message?: string }>} messages\n * @param {string | null} trustedTypesPolicyName\n */\n\n\nfunction show(type, messages, trustedTypesPolicyName) {\n  ensureOverlayExists(function () {\n    messages.forEach(function (message) {\n      var entryElement = document.createElement(\"div\");\n      var typeElement = document.createElement(\"span\");\n\n      var _formatProblem = formatProblem(type, message),\n          header = _formatProblem.header,\n          body = _formatProblem.body;\n\n      typeElement.innerText = header;\n      typeElement.style.color = \"#\".concat(colors.red); // Make it look similar to our terminal.\n\n      var text = ansiHTML(encode(body));\n      var messageTextNode = document.createElement(\"div\");\n      messageTextNode.innerHTML = overlayTrustedTypesPolicy ? overlayTrustedTypesPolicy.createHTML(text) : text;\n      entryElement.appendChild(typeElement);\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      entryElement.appendChild(messageTextNode);\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      entryElement.appendChild(document.createElement(\"br\"));\n      /** @type {HTMLDivElement} */\n\n      containerElement.appendChild(entryElement);\n    });\n  }, trustedTypesPolicyName);\n}\n\nexport { formatProblem, show, hide {"ast":null,"code":"var logLevel = \"info\";\nfunction dummy() {}\nfunction shouldLog(level) {\n  var shouldLog = logLevel === \"info\" && level === \"info\" || [\"info\", \"warning\"].indexOf(logLevel) >= 0 && level === \"warning\" || [\"info\", \"warning\", \"error\"].indexOf(logLevel) >= 0 && level === \"error\";\n  return shouldLog;\n}\nfunction logGroup(logFn) {\n  return function (level, msg) {\n    if (shouldLog(level)) {\n      logFn(msg);\n    }\n  };\n}\nmodule.exports = function (level, msg) {\n  if (shouldLog(level)) {\n    if (level === \"info\") {\n node/no-unsupported-features/node-builtins */\nvar group = console.group || dummy;\nvar groupCollapsed = console.groupCollapsed || dummy;\nvar groupEnd = console.groupEnd || dummy;\n/* eslint-enable node/no-unsupported-features/node-builtins */\n\nmodule.exports.group = logGroup(group);\nmodule.exports.groupCollapsed = logGroup(groupCollapsed);\nmodule.exports.groupEnd = AddEditComponent_div_3_Template(rf, ctx) {\n  if (rf & 1) {\n    i0.ɵɵelementStart(0, \"div\", 28);\n    i0.ɵɵelement(1, \"span\", 29);\n    i0.ɵɵelementEnd();\n  }\n}\nexport class AddEditComponent {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n    // show/hide toggles\n    this.showPassword = false;\n    this.showConfirmPassword = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    // password validators: required when creating, optional when editing\n    const passwordValidators = this.id ? [Validators.minLength(8)] : [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8)];\n    const confirmValidators = this.id ? [] : [Validators.required];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      status: ['', Validators.required],\n      password: ['', passwordValidators],\n      confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\n    }, {\n      validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\n    });\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          if (!account) {\n            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\n            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n            return;\n          }\n          // patch values (do not patch password fields)\n          const {\n            password,\n            confirmPassword,\n            ...rest\n          } = account;\n          this.form.patchValue(rest);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: error => {\n          this.alertService.error(error);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // shortcut for easy access to form fields in template\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  // validator: ensures password and confirmPassword match (only triggers when appropriate)\n  mustMatch(controlName, matchingControlName) {\n    return formGroup => {\n      const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\n      const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\n      if (!control || !matchingControl) return;\n      // don't overwrite other errors on matchingControl\n      if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors.mustMatch) {\n        return;\n      }\n      // if either has a value, require them to match\n      if ((control.value || matchingControl.value) && control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\n        matchingControl.setErrors({\n          mustMatch: true\n        });\n      } else {\n        // if both empty or match, clear mustMatch error\n        if (matchingControl.errors) {\n          // if the only error is mustMatch, clear it; otherwise keep other errors\n          const e = matchingControl.errors;\n          if (Object.keys(e).length === 1 && e.mustMatch) {\n            matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n          } else if (!e.mustMatch) {\n            // keep other errors (e.g. required) intact\n          } else {\n            // remove mustMatch while preserving others (rare)\n            delete e.mustMatch;\n            if (Object.keys(e).length === 0) matchingControl.setErrors(null);else matchingControl.setErrors(e);\n          }\n        } else {\n          matchingControl.setErrors(null);\n        }\n      }\n    };\n  }\n  togglePassword() {\n    this.showPassword = !this.showPassword;\n  }\n  toggleConfirmPassword() {\n    this.showConfirmPassword = !this.showConfirmPassword;\n  }\n  cancel() {\n    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    // stop if form invalid\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    // prepare payload: remove confirmPassword, and if password is blank remove it too\n    const payload = {\n      ...this.form.value\n    };\n    delete payload.confirmPassword;\n    if (!payload.password || payload.password.trim() === '') {\n      delete payload.password;\n    }\n    let request$;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id, payload);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      request$ = this.accountService.create(payload);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    request$.pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\n      },\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function AddEditComponent_Factory(t) {\n  return new (t || AddEditComponent)(i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i1.FormBuilder), i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i2.ActivatedRoute), i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i2.Router), i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i3.AccountService), i0.ɵɵdirectiveInject(i3.AlertService));\n};\nAddEditComponent.ɵcmp = AK,CAAC;QAC9B,IAAI,CAAC2B,UAAU,GAAG,KAAK;MAC3B;KACH,CAAC;EACV;;;mBA7JS5D,gBAAgB;AAAA;;QAAhBA,gBAAgB;EAAAqE;EAAAC;EAAAC;EAAAC;EAAAC;IAAA;MCR7B1E,0BAAI;MAAAA,YAAW;MAAAA,iBAAK;MACpBA,qEA0DO;MAEPA,iEAEM;;;MA/DFA,eAAW;MAAXA,+BAAW;MACRA,eAAc;MAAdA,mCAAc;MA4DfA,eAAa;MAAbA,kCAAa","names":["Validators","first","i0","AddEditComponent","constructor","formBuilder","route","router","accountService","alertService","ngOnInit","id","snapshot","params","passwordValidators","minLength","required","confirmValidators","form","group","title","firstName","lastName","email","role","status","password","confirmPassword","validators","mustMatch","loading","getById","pipe","subscribe","next","account","error","navigate","rest","patchValue","f","controls","controlName","matchingControlName","formGroup","control","matchingControl","errors","value","setErrors","e","Object","keys","length","togglePassword","showPassword","toggleConfirmPassword","showConfirmPassword","cancel","onSubmit","submitted","clear","invalid","submitting","payload","trim","request$","message","update","create","success","keepAfterRouteChange","selectors","decls","vars","consts","template"],"sourceRoot":"","sources":["C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.ts","C:\\Users\\Kenith Labonite\\Frontend\\group-project-repo\\src\\app\\admin\\accounts\\add-edit.component.html"],"sourcesContent":["import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';\r\nimport { Router, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router';\r\nimport { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';\r\nimport { first } from 'rxjs/operators';\r\n\r\nimport { AccountService, AlertService } from '@app/_services';\r\n\r\n@Component({ templateUrl: 'add-edit.component.html' })\r\nexport class AddEditComponent implements OnInit {\r\n    form!: FormGroup;\r\n    id?: string;\r\n    title!: string;\r\n    loading = false;\r\n    submitting = false;\r\n    submitted = false;\r\n    // show/hide toggles\r\n    showPassword = false;\r\n    showConfirmPassword = false;\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        private formBuilder: FormBuilder,\r\n        private route: ActivatedRoute,\r\n        private router: Router,\r\n        private accountService: AccountService,\r\n        private alertService: AlertService\r\n    ) {}\r\n\r\n    ngOnInit() {\r\n        this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\r\n\r\n        // password validators: required when creating, optional when editing\r\n        const passwordValidators = this.id ? [Validators.minLength(8)] : [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8)];\r\n        const confirmValidators = this.id ? [] : [Validators.required];\r\n\r\n        this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\r\n            title: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            firstName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            lastName: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\r\n            role: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            status: ['', Validators.required],\r\n            password: ['', passwordValidators],\r\n            confirmPassword: ['', confirmValidators]\r\n        }, {\r\n            validators: this.mustMatch('password', 'confirmPassword')\r\n        });\r\n\r\n        this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            this.loading = true;\r\n            this.accountService.getById(this.id)\r\n                .pipe(first())\r\n                .subscribe({\r\n                    next: account => {\r\n                        if (!account) {\r\n                            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\r\n                            this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n                            return;\r\n                        }\r\n                        // patch values (do not patch password fields)\r\n                        const { password, confirmPassword, ...rest } = account as any;\r\n                        this.form.patchValue(rest);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    },\r\n                    error: error => {\r\n                        this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                        this.loading = false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // shortcut for easy access to form fields in template\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    // validator: ensures password and confirmPassword match (only triggers when appropriate)\r\n    private mustMatch(controlName: string, matchingControlName: string) {\r\n        return (formGroup: FormGroup) => {\r\n            const control = formGroup.controls[controlName];\r\n            const matchingControl = formGroup.controls[matchingControlName];\r\n\r\n            if (!control || !matchingControl) return;\r\n\r\n            // don't overwrite other errors on matchingControl\r\n            if (matchingControl.errors && !matchingControl.errors.mustMatch) {\r\n                return;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            // if either has a value, require them to match\r\n            if ((control.value || matchingControl.value) && control.value !== matchingControl.value) {\r\n                matchingControl.setErrors({ mustMatch: true });\r\n            } else {\r\n                // if both empty or match, clear mustMatch error\r\n                if (matchingControl.errors) {\r\n                    // if the only error is mustMatch, clear it; otherwise keep other errors\r\n                    const e = matchingControl.errors;\r\n                    if (Object.keys(e).length === 1 && e.mustMatch) {\r\n                        matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n                    } else if (!e.mustMatch) {\r\n                        // keep other errors (e.g. required) intact\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        // remove mustMatch while preserving others (rare)\r\n                        delete e.mustMatch;\r\n                        if (Object.keys(e).length === 0) matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n                        else matchingControl.setErrors(e);\r\n                    }\r\n                } else {\r\n                    matchingControl.setErrors(null);\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        };\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    togglePassword() {\r\n        this.showPassword = !this.showPassword;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    toggleConfirmPassword() {\r\n        this.showConfirmPassword = !this.showConfirmPassword;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    cancel() {\r\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n        this.submitted = true;\r\n        this.alertService.clear();\r\n\r\n        // stop if form invalid\r\n        if (this.form.invalid) return;\r\n\r\n        this.submitting = true;\r\n\r\n        // prepare payload: remove confirmPassword, and if password is blank remove it too\r\n        const payload: any = { ...this.form.value };\r\n        delete payload.confirmPassword;\r\n        if (!payload.password || payload.password.trim() === '') {\r\n            delete payload.password;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        let request$;\r\n        let message: string;\r\n\r\n        if (this.id) {\r\n            request$ = this.accountService.update(this.id!, payload);\r\n            message = 'Account updated';\r\n        } else {\r\n            request$ = this.accountService.create(payload);\r\n            message = 'Account created';\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        request$\r\n            .pipe(first())\r\n            .subscribe({\r\n                next: () => {\r\n                    this.alertService.success(message, { keepAfterRouteChange: true });\r\n                    this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts']);\r\n                },\r\n                error: error => {\r\n                    this.alertService.error(error);\r\n                    this.submitting = false;\r\n                }\r\n            });\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","<h1>{{ title }}</h1>\r\n<form *ngIf=\"!loading\" [formGroup]=\"form\" (ngSubmit)=\"onSubmit()\">\r\n  <div class=\"row\">\r\n    <div class=\"mb-3 col-2\">\r\n      <label class=\"form-label\">Title</label>\r\n      <select formControlName=\"title\" class=\"form-select\" [ngClass]=\"{ 'is-invalid': submitted && f.title.errors }\">\r\n        <option value=\"\">-- Select --</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mr\">Mr</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Mrs\">Mrs</option>\r\n        <option value=\"Miss\">Miss</option>\r\n      </select>\r\n      <div *ngIf=\"submitted && f.title.errors\" {\n  constructor(formBuilder, route, router, accountService, alertService) {\n    this.formBuilder = formBuilder;\n    this.route = route;\n    this.router = router;\n    this.accountService = accountService;\n    this.alertService = alertService;\n    this.loading = false;\n    this.submitting = false;\n    this.submitted = false;\n  }\n  ngOnInit() {\n    this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id'];\n    this.form = this.formBuilder.group({\n      title: ['', Validators.required],\n      firstName: ['', Validators.required],\n      lastName: ['', Validators.required],\n      email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]],\n      role: ['', Validators.required],\n      status: ['', Validators.required] // ✅ new status field\n    });\n\n    this.title = this.id ? 'Edit Account' : 'Create Account';\n    if (this.id) {\n      this.loading = true;\n      this.accountService.getById(this.id).pipe(first()).subscribe({\n        next: account => {\n          if (!account) {\n            this.alertService.error('Account not found');\n            this.router.navigateByUrl('/account');\n            return;\n          }\n          this.form.patchValue(account);\n          this.loading = false;\n        },\n        error: error => {\n          this.alertService.error(error);\n          this.loading = false;\n        }\n      });\n    }\n  }\n  // convenience getter\n  get f() {\n    return this.form.controls;\n  }\n  onSubmit() {\n    this.submitted = true;\n    this.alertService.clear();\n    if (this.form.invalid) return;\n    this.submitting = true;\n    let saveAccount;\n    let message;\n    if (this.id) {\n      saveAccount = () => this.accountService.update(this.id, this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account updated';\n    } else {\n      saveAccount = () => this.accountService.create(this.form.value);\n      message = 'Account created';\n    }\n    saveAccount().pipe(first()).subscribe({\n      next: () => {\n        this.alertService.success(message, {\n          keepAfterRouteChange: true\n        });\n        this.router.navigate(['/admin/accounts'], {\n          relativeTo: this.route\n        });\n      },\n      error: error => {\n        this.alertService.error(error);\n        this.submitting = false;\n      }\n    });\n  }\n}\nAddEditComponent.ɵfac = function false;\r\n                    }\r\n                });\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // convenience getter\r\n    get f() { return this.form.controls; }\r\n\r\n    onSubmit() {\r\n {"ast":null,"code":"import { Observable } from '../Observable';\nexport function scheduleArray(input, scheduler) {\n  return new Observable(subscriber => {\n    let i = 0;\n    return scheduler.schedule(function () {\n      if (i === input.length) {\n        subscriber.complete();\n      } else {\n        subscriber.next(input[i++]);\n        if (!subscriber.closed) {\n          this.schedule();\n        }\n      }\n    });\n  });\n}","map":{"version":3,"names":["Observable","scheduleArray","input","scheduler","subscriber","i","schedule","length","complete","next","closed"],"sources":["C:/Users/Kenith Labonite/Frontend/group-project-repo/node_modules/rxjs/dist/esm/internal/scheduled/scheduleArray.js"],"sourcesContent":["import { Observable } from '../Observable';\nexport function scheduleArray(input, scheduler) {\n    return new Observable((subscriber) => {\n        let i = 0;\n        return scheduler.schedule(function () {\n            if (i === input.length) {\n                subscriber.complete();\n            }\n            else {\n                subscriber.next(input[i++]);\n                if (!subscriber.closed) {\n                    this.schedule();\n                }\n            }\n        });\n    });\n}\n"],"mappings":"AAAA,SAASA,UAAU,QAAQ,eAAe;AAC1C,OAAO,SAASC,aAAa,CAACC,KAAK,EAAEC,SAAS,EAAE;EAC5C,OAAO,IAAIH,UAAU,CAAEI,UAAU,IAAK;IAClC,IAAIC,CAAC,GAAG,CAAC;IACT,OAAOF,SAAS,CAACG,QAAQ,CAAC,YAAY;MAClC,IAAID,CAAC,KAAKH,KAAK,CAACK,MAAM,EAAE;QACpBH,UAAU,CAACI,QAAQ,EAAE;MACzB,CAAC,MACI;QACDJ,UAAU,CAACK,IAAI,CAACP,KAAK,CAACG,CAAC,EAAE,CAAC,CAAC;QAC3B,IAAI,CAACD,UAAU,CAACM,MAAM,EAAE;UACpB,IAAI,CAACJ,QAAQ,EAAE;QACnB;MACJ;IACJ,CAAC,CAAC;EACN,CAAC,CAAC;AACN","ignoreList":[]},"metadata":{},"sourceType":"module","externalDependencies":[]}
